MOTORCYCLING	-	JAPANESE	WIN	BOTH	ROUND	NINE	SUPERBIKE	RACES	.
VBG	:	JJ	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O
SUGO	,	Japan	1996-08-25
NNP	,	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
Teenager	Yuuichi	Takeda	,	racing	in	only	his	first	season	,	outclassed	the	big	names	to	win	the	first	race	in	round	nine	of	the	world	superbike	championship	on	Sunday	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	,	VBG	IN	RB	PRP$	JJ	NN	,	VBD	DT	JJ	NNS	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	JJ	CD	IN	DT	NN	NN	NN	IN	NNP	.
O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Takeda	,	18	,	showed	poise	far	beyond	his	years	to	overtake	Australian	Ducati	rider	Troy	Corser	,	last	year	's	championship	runner-up	,	with	four	of	the	25	laps	left	.
NNP	,	CD	,	VBD	NN	RB	IN	PRP$	NNS	TO	VB	NNP	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	,	JJ	NN	POS	NN	NN	,	IN	CD	IN	DT	CD	NNS	VBD	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	B-ORG	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Honda	's	Takeda	was	pursued	past	Corser	by	the	Yamaha	duo	of	Noriyuki	Haga	and	Wataru	Yoshikawa	with	Haga	briefly	taking	the	lead	in	the	final	chicane	on	the	last	lap	.
NNP	POS	NNP	VBD	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	RB	VBG	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
B-ORG	O	B-PER	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
But	Takeda	found	one	more	spurt	of	power	to	just	take	the	flag	first	with	Haga	second	and	Yoshikawa	third	.
CC	NNP	VBD	CD	JJR	NN	IN	NN	TO	RB	VB	DT	NN	RB	IN	NNP	NN	CC	NNP	NN	.
O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	B-PER	O	O
Haga	had	the	consolation	of	recording	the	fastest	lap	at	147.159	kph	.
NN	VBD	DT	NN	IN	VBG	DT	JJS	NN	IN	CD	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Corser	,	who	crashed	during	practice	on	Friday	,	limped	in	fourth	,	four	seconds	behind	Takeda	with	championship	leader	Aaron	Slight	of	New	Zealand	11	seconds	behind	the	winner	.
RB	,	WP	VBD	IN	NN	IN	NNP	,	VBN	IN	JJ	,	CD	NNS	IN	NNP	IN	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	CD	NNS	IN	DT	NN	.

In	the	second	race	,	Takeda	again	challenged	strongly	until	the	fifth	lap	from	the	end	when	he	crashed	while	running	second	to	eventual	race	winner	Takuma	Aoki	.
IN	DT	JJ	NN	,	NNP	RB	VBD	RB	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	WRB	PRP	VBD	IN	VBG	JJ	TO	JJ	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	.

Aoki	,	the	elder	brother	of	reigning	125cc	world	champion	Haruchika	,	had	a	race-long	duel	with	John	Kocinski	of	the	United	States	on	a	Ducati	before	taking	the	chequered	flag	.
NNP	,	DT	JJR	NN	IN	VBG	CD	NN	NN	NNP	,	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	IN	VBG	DT	VBN	NN	.

Kocinski	led	for	the	early	laps	before	he	was	passed	first	by	Aoki	,	who	recorded	the	fastest	lap	of	147.786	kph	,	and	then	by	Takeda	.
NNP	VBD	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	IN	PRP	VBD	VBN	RB	IN	NNP	,	WP	VBN	DT	JJS	NN	IN	CD	NNS	,	CC	RB	IN	NNP	.

With	Takeda	out	of	the	race	,	Kocinski	regained	second	place	but	he	could	not	overtake	Aoki	.
IN	NNP	IN	IN	DT	NN	,	NNP	VBD	JJ	NN	CC	PRP	MD	RB	VB	NNP	.
O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O
Haga	again	was	the	unlucky	rider	finishing	third	ahead	of	Slight	with	Corser	in	10th	place	.

EU	rejects	German	call	to	boycott	British	lamb	.
NNP	VBZ	JJ	NN	TO	VB	JJ	NN	.
B-ORG	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O
Peter	Blackburn
NNP	NNP
B-PER	I-PER
BRUSSELS	1996-08-22
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
The	European	Commission	said	on	Thursday	it	disagreed	with	German	advice	to	consumers	to	shun	British	lamb	until	scientists	determine	whether	mad	cow	disease	can	be	transmitted	to	sheep	.
DT	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	PRP	VBD	IN	JJ	NN	TO	NNS	TO	VB	JJ	NN	IN	NNS	VBP	IN	JJ	NN	NN	MD	VB	VBN	TO	NN	.
O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Germany	's	representative	to	the	European	Union	's	veterinary	committee	Werner	Zwingmann	said	on	Wednesday	consumers	should	buy	sheepmeat	from	countries	other	than	Britain	until	the	scientific	advice	was	clearer	.
NNP	POS	NN	TO	DT	NNP	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	NNS	MD	VB	NN	IN	NNS	JJ	IN	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NN	VBD	JJR	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	We	do	n't	support	any	such	recommendation	because	we	do	n't	see	any	grounds	for	it	,	"	the	Commission	's	chief	spokesman	Nikolaus	van	der	Pas	told	a	news	briefing	.
"	PRP	VBP	RB	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	PRP	VBP	RB	VB	DT	NNS	IN	PRP	,	"	DT	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	FW	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O
He	said	further	scientific	study	was	required	and	if	it	was	found	that	action	was	needed	it	should	be	taken	by	the	European	Union	.
PRP	VBD	JJ	JJ	NN	VBD	VBN	CC	IN	PRP	VBD	VBN	IN	NN	VBD	VBN	PRP	MD	VB	VBN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O
He	said	a	proposal	last	month	by	EU	Farm	Commissioner	Franz	Fischler	to	ban	sheep	brains	,	spleens	and	spinal	cords	from	the	human	and	animal	food	chains	was	a	highly	specific	and	precautionary	move	to	protect	human	health	.
PRP	VBD	DT	NN	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	TO	VB	NN	NNS	,	NNS	CC	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NN	CC	NN	NN	NNS	VBD	DT	RB	JJ	CC	JJ	NN	TO	VB	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Fischler	proposed	EU-wide	measures	after	reports	from	Britain	and	France	that	under	laboratory	conditions	sheep	could	contract	Bovine	Spongiform	Encephalopathy	(	BSE	)	--	mad	cow	disease	.
JJR	VBN	NNP	VBZ	IN	NNS	IN	NNP	CC	NNP	WDT	IN	NN	NNS	NN	MD	VB	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	:	JJ	NN	NN	.
B-PER	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	I-MISC	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O
But	Fischler	agreed	to	review	his	proposal	after	the	EU	's	standing	veterinary	committee	,	mational	animal	health	officials	,	questioned	if	such	action	was	justified	as	there	was	only	a	slight	risk	to	human	health	.

German	first-time	registrations	of	motor	vehicles	jumped	14.2	percent	in	July	this	year	from	the	year-earlier	period	,	the	Federal	office	for	motor	vehicles	said	on	Thursday	.

Plastic	surgery	gets	boost	in	Brazil	.
NN	NN	VBZ	NN	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O
Simona	de	Logu
NNP	NNP	NNP
B-PER	I-PER	I-PER
RIO	DE	JANEIRO	1996-12-06
NNP	NNP	NNP	CD
B-LOC	I-LOC	I-LOC	O
Plastic	surgery	is	booming	,	especially	among	men	,	as	Brazilians	spend	much	of	their	new-found	wealth	on	the	latest	beauty	treatments	,	said	the	organisers	of	a	four-day	international	plastic	surgery	conference	that	opened	on	Friday	.
NN	NN	VBZ	JJ	,	RB	IN	NNS	,	IN	NNS	VBP	JJ	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	DT	JJS	NN	NNS	,	VBD	DT	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	WDT	VBD	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	number	of	plastic	surgeries	in	Brazil	has	jumped	30	percent	to	an	estimated	150,000	this	year	since	an	anti-inflation	plan	was	introduced	in	July	1994	,	Farid	Hakme	,	the	president	of	the	Brazilian	Plastic	Surgery	Society	(	SBCP	)	,	said	.
DT	NN	IN	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	VBZ	VBN	CD	NN	TO	DT	VBN	CD	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	VBD	VBN	IN	NNP	CD	,	NNP	NNP	,	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	,	VBD	.

The	number	of	operations	on	men	increased	even	more	--	by	80	percent	,	from	8,000	in	1994	to	15,000	in	1995	,	he	said	.
DT	NN	IN	NNS	IN	NNS	VBD	RB	RBR	:	IN	CD	NN	,	IN	CD	IN	CD	TO	CD	IN	CD	,	PRP	VBD	.

"	Brazil	ranks	right	at	the	top	for	plastic	surgery	with	respect	to	the	number	of	surgeons	,	the	number	of	patients	,	number	of	operations	,	number	of	conferences	.

Brazil	has	been	at	the	forefront	in	plastic	surgery	for	decades	and	is	home	to	one	of	the	most	famous	surgeons	,	Ivo	Pitangy	.

Hakme	attributes	Brazil	's	fascination	with	plastic	surgery	not	to	excessive	vanity	but	to	the	country	's	mix	and	match	of	different	races	,	which	can	create	physical	disharmonies	.	"

Brazil	's	most	sought-after	beauty	treatment	is	liposuction	in	which	fat	is	sucked	away	from	areas	of	the	body	,	with	about	30,000	operations	a	year	at	a	cost	of	$	3,000	to	$	4,000	each	.

RUGBY	UNION	-	NEW	ZEALAND	WIN	FIRST	SERIES	IN	SOUTH	AFRICA	.
NNP	NN	:	JJ	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O
PRETORIA	,	South	Africa	1996-08-24
NNP	,	NNP	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O
New	Zealand	made	history	on	Saturday	when	they	completed	their	first	series	victory	in	South	Africa	with	a	33-26	victory	in	the	second	test	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	NN	IN	NNP	WRB	PRP	VBN	PRP$	JJ	NN	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	win	gave	the	All	Blacks	an	unbeatable	2-0	lead	in	the	three-test	series	.
DT	VBP	VBN	DT	DT	NNPS	DT	JJ	CD	JJ	IN	DT	NN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Each	side	scored	three	tries	and	the	Springboks	outscored	the	All	Blacks	15-12	in	the	second	half	but	still	suffered	a	fourth	successive	defeat	against	their	old	enemies	.
DT	NN	VBD	CD	VBZ	CC	DT	NNP	VBD	DT	DT	NNPS	CD	IN	DT	JJ	NN	CC	RB	VBD	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	IN	PRP$	JJ	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Two	tries	from	wing	Jeff	Wilson	in	the	first	quarter	gave	New	Zealand	a	24-11	lead	before	tries	from	flanker	Ruben	Kruger	and	scrum-half	Joost	van	der	Westhuizen	in	the	space	of	two	minutes	narrowed	the	gap	to	a	single	point	at	23-24	.

The	Springboks	would	have	gone	ahead	had	not	fly-half	Joel	Stransky	's	conversion	hit	an	upright	and	New	Zealand	only	scrambled	to	safety	through	a	fine	penalty	from	replacement	fly-half	Jon	Preston	and	a	drop	goal	by	number	eight	Zinzan	Brooke	.

Information	technology	firm	Electronic	Data	Systems	said	on	Friday	it	had	bagged	a	contract	for	the	first	air	traffic	control	project	being	funded	under	the	Private	Finance	Initiative	.
NN	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	PRP	VBD	VBN	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	NN	NN	NN	VBG	VBN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O
In	a	statement	,	EDS	said	the	contract	would	be	in	the	region	of	50	million	stg	.
IN	DT	NN	,	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	MD	VB	IN	DT	NN	IN	CD	CD	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	contract	involved	upgrading	the	flight	data	processing	system	at	the	Oceanic	Control	Centre	in	Prestwick	in	south	west	Scotland	for	National	Air	Traffic	Services	Ltd	(	NATS	)	,	subsidiary	of	the	Civil	Aviation	Authority	.
DT	NN	VBD	VBG	DT	NN	NNS	NN	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	IN	JJ	NN	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	,	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	I-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O
The	system	is	responsible	for	the	control	of	aircraft	flying	transatlantic	routes	from	Europe	and	North	America	.
DT	NN	VBZ	JJ	IN	DT	NN	IN	NN	VBG	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O
The	system	,	which	would	use	satellite	technology	,	is	scheduled	to	enter	service	in	2000	.

NNP	NNP	CD
B-LOC	I-LOC	O
New	York	City	on	Friday	said	that	it	planned	a	$	775	million	refunding	for	January	that	will	include	its	first	floating	rate	issue	of	taxable	debt	for	European	investors	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	VBD	IN	PRP	VBD	DT	$	CD	CD	NN	IN	NNP	WDT	MD	VB	PRP$	JJ	VBG	NN	NN	IN	JJ	NN	IN	JJ	NNS	.
B-LOC	I-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O
A	city	official	,	who	declined	to	be	named	,	explained	that	Goldman	,	Sachs	,	which	this	summer	was	demoted	to	the	second	tier	of	the	syndicate	,	proposed	the	floating	rate	issue	and	as	a	result	was	promoted	to	book	runner	for	this	offering	.
DT	NN	NN	,	WP	VBD	TO	VB	VBN	,	VBD	IN	NNP	,	NNP	,	WDT	DT	NN	VBD	VBN	TO	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	,	VBD	DT	VBG	NN	NN	CC	IN	DT	NN	VBD	VBN	TO	NN	NN	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
By	selling	the	floating	rate	debt	,	the	city	hopes	to	establish	a	benchmark	,	the	city	official	said	,	adding	that	it	needed	a	large	deal	to	accomplish	this	objective	.
IN	VBG	DT	VBG	NN	NN	,	DT	NN	VBZ	TO	VB	DT	NN	,	DT	NN	NN	VBD	,	VBG	IN	PRP	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	TO	VB	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	city	in	late	June	sold	its	first	issue	of	Euronotes	,	a	strategy	that	it	says	saved	it	$	500,000	in	interest	costs	,	and	it	has	been	trying	to	build	on	this	strategy	of	expanding	the	pool	of	potential	investors	since	then	.

Homestake	Mining	Co	tops	Wall	Street	's	list	as	the	most	likely	white	knight	buyer	for	Santa	Fe	Pacific	Gold	Corp	if	Santa	Fe	rejects	unsolicited	suitor	Newmont	Mining	Corp	.

Santa	Fe	is	so	far	mum	on	the	more	than	$	2	billion	stock	swap	takeover	proposal	from	Newmont	,	announced	Thursday	.
NNP	NNP	VBZ	RB	RB	JJ	IN	DT	JJR	IN	$	CD	CD	NN	NN	NN	NN	IN	NNP	,	VBD	NNP	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O
Wall	Street	,	since	the	bid	,	has	speculated	that	any	deal	between	Newmont	and	Santa	Fe	would	be	a	"	bear	hug	,	"	or	a	reluctantly	negotiated	agreement	where	the	buyer	is	not	necessarily	a	friendly	suitor	.

A	knife-wielding	neighbour	apparently	intent	on	sexual	assault	invaded	a	teenage	slumber	party	on	Friday	,	killing	one	girl	and	wounding	three	others	,	police	said	.
DT	JJ	NN	RB	NN	IN	JJ	NN	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	NN	IN	NNP	,	VBG	CD	NN	CC	VBG	CD	NNS	,	NN	VBD	.

At	about	4	a.m.	EDT	(	0800	GMT	)	,	a	group	of	teenaged	girls	were	having	the	overnight	party	in	the	Camelot	subdivision	of	this	eastern	Virginia	city	,	when	a	man	entered	the	house	,	wielding	a	knife	,	threatening	to	sexually	assault	the	girls	.

Commonwealth	ministers	concerned	about	human	rights	in	Nigeria	may	cancel	a	planned	trip	there	because	of	government	restrictions	on	their	mission	,	Canadian	Foreign	Minister	Lloyd	Axworthy	said	on	Friday	.

B-LOC	O
Investors	gave	into	gold	fever	Friday	morning	,	with	heavy	trading	in	a	handful	of	Toronto-based	gold	companies	.
NNS	VBD	IN	NN	NN	NNP	NN	,	IN	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	JJ	NN	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O
TVX	Gold	Inc	was	up	C$	0.30	to	C$	11.55	in	trading	of	780,000	shares	,	while	Kinross	Gold	Corp	gained	C$	0.25	to	C$	11	in	volume	of	720,000	shares	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	RP	$	CD	TO	$	CD	IN	VBG	IN	CD	NNS	,	IN	NNP	NN	NNP	VBD	$	CD	TO	$	CD	IN	NN	IN	CD	NNS	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-MISC	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
And	Scorpion	Minerals	Inc	,	a	junior	gold	exploration	company	with	five	Indonesian	mining	properties	,	was	up	C$	0.50	to	C$	6	,	with	about	120,000	shares	changing	hands	.
CC	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	IN	CD	JJ	NN	NNS	,	VBD	RP	$	CD	TO	$	CD	,	IN	IN	CD	NNS	VBG	NNS	.

TVX	and	Kinross	rose	after	recent	buy	recommendations	from	U.S.	brokers	,	analysts	said	.

Buffett	raises	Property	Capital	stake	.

WASHINGTON	1996-08-23
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Omaha	billionaire	Warren	Buffett	said	Friday	he	raised	his	stake	in	Property	Capital	Trust	to	8.0	percent	from	6.7	percent	.
NN	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	PRP	VBD	PRP$	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	NNP	TO	CD	NN	IN	CD	NN	.
B-LOC	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
In	a	filing	with	the	Securities	and	Exchnage	Commission	,	Buffett	said	he	bought	62,900	additional	common	shares	of	the	Boston-based	real	estate	investment	trust	at	prices	ranging	from	$	7.65	to	$	8.02	a	share	.
IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNPS	CC	NNP	NNP	,	NNP	VBD	PRP	VBD	CD	JJ	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	NN	IN	NNS	VBG	IN	$	CD	TO	$	CD	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	purchases	increased	his	holding	in	the	company	to	725,900	shares	,	which	was	purchased	for	a	total	of	$	6.2	million	,	he	said	.
DT	NNS	VBD	PRP$	NN	IN	DT	NN	TO	CD	NNS	,	WDT	VBD	VBN	IN	DT	NN	IN	$	CD	CD	,	PRP	VBD	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Buffett	,	who	is	well-known	as	a	long-term	investor	,	is	chairman	of	Berkshire	Hathaway	Inc	,	a	holding	company	through	which	he	holds	investments	in	several	large	U.S.	companies	.

Colombia	,	U.S.	reach	aviation	agreement	.
NNP	,	NNP	NN	NN	NN	.

MIAMI	1996-08-23
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
The	U.S.	and	Colombian	governments	reached	an	agreement	that	will	allow	AMR	Corp	's	American	Airlines	to	operate	three	round-trip	flights	between	New	York	and	Bogota	,	the	Department	of	Transportation	said	Friday	.
DT	NNP	CC	JJ	NNS	VBD	DT	NN	WDT	MD	VB	NNP	NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	TO	VB	CD	JJ	NNS	IN	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	,	DT	NNP	IN	NNP	VBD	NNP	.
O	B-LOC	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O
Under	the	agreement	,	which	followed	talks	in	Miami	this	week	,	AMR	also	will	be	allowed	to	shift	up	to	four	of	the	weekly	flights	it	now	operates	between	Miami	and	Colombia	to	its	New	York	gateway	.
IN	DT	NN	,	WDT	VBD	NNS	IN	NNP	DT	NN	,	NNP	RB	MD	VB	VBN	TO	VB	IN	TO	CD	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	PRP	RB	VBZ	IN	NNP	CC	NNP	TO	PRP$	NNP	NNP	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O
The	United	States	also	will	be	able	to	designate	one	new	all-cargo	carrier	for	service	between	the	two	nations	after	two	years	.
DT	NNP	NNP	RB	MD	VB	JJ	TO	VB	CD	JJ	NN	NN	IN	NN	IN	DT	CD	NNS	IN	CD	NNS	.
O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Colombia	was	permitted	to	add	a	single	additional	round-trip	flight	to	its	current	New	York	service	,	although	it	will	not	be	able	to	do	so	while	under	Category	Two	(	Conditional	)	status	under	the	Federal	Aviation	Administration	's	International	Aviation	Safety	program	.
NNP	VBD	VBN	TO	VB	DT	JJ	JJ	JJ	NN	TO	PRP$	JJ	NNP	NNP	NN	,	IN	PRP	MD	RB	VB	JJ	TO	VB	RB	JJ	IN	NNP	CD	(	NNP	)	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	NNP	NN	.

Colombia	would	be	allowed	to	add	new	service	when	its	safety	assessment	has	been	improved	,	the	department	said	.
NNP	MD	VB	VBN	TO	VB	JJ	NN	WRB	PRP$	NN	NN	VBZ	VBN	VBN	,	DT	NN	VBD	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
With	the	exception	of	the	new	services	just	agreed	to	,	the	governments	of	the	two	nations	have	agreed	to	maintain	their	current	level	of	routes	and	airlines	for	the	next	2-1/2	years	,	the	agreement	said	.
IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	RB	VBD	TO	,	DT	NNS	IN	DT	CD	NNS	VBP	VBN	TO	VB	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	NNS	CC	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NNS	,	DT	NN	VBD	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	agreement	resolved	a	dispute	that	arose	in	June	when	Colombia	turned	down	American	's	request	to	operate	flights	between	New	York	and	Bogota	,	a	denial	that	prompted	the	United	States	to	charge	that	the	Colombians	were	breaking	a	bilateral	aviation	agreement	and	to	propose	sanctions	against	one	of	two	Colombian	airlines	,	Avianca	and	ACES	.

RTRS	-	Golf	:	Norman	sacks	his	coach	after	disappointing	season	.

B-LOC	O
World	number	one	golfer	Greg	Norman	has	sacked	his	coach	Butch	Harmon	after	a	disappointing	season	.
NNP	NN	CD	NN	NNP	NNP	VBZ	VBN	PRP$	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O
"	Butch	and	I	are	finished	,	"	Norman	told	reporters	on	Thursday	before	the	start	of	the	World	Series	of	Golf	in	Akron	,	Ohio	.
"	NNP	CC	PRP	VBP	VBN	,	"	NNP	VBD	NNS	IN	NNP	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	,	NNP	.

Norman	,	a	two-time	British	Open	champion	,	parted	ways	with	his	long-time	mentor	after	drawing	a	blank	in	this	year	's	four	majors	,	winning	two	tournaments	worldwide	.
NNP	,	DT	JJ	JJ	NNP	NN	,	VBD	NNS	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	DT	JJ	IN	DT	NN	POS	CD	NNS	,	VBG	CD	NNS	JJ	.

The	blonde	Australian	opened	with	a	level	par	round	of	70	in	Akron	,	leaving	him	four	shots	adrift	of	the	leaders	,	Americans	Billy	Mayfair	and	Paul	Goydos	and	Japan	's	Hidemichi	Tanaki	.

Dutch	champions	Ajax	Amsterdam	faltered	in	their	second	league	match	of	the	season	on	Saturday	losing	2-0	away	at	Heerenveen	.
JJ	NNS	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	VBG	CD	RB	IN	FW	.
B-MISC	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O
Ajax	,	who	had	a	dismal	series	of	pre-season	results	before	beating	NAC	of	Breda	in	their	opening	game	,	had	the	best	of	an	entertaining	first	half	but	failed	to	break	the	deadlock	.
NNP	,	WP	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	IN	JJ	NNS	IN	VBG	NNP	IN	NNPS	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	,	VBD	DT	JJS	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	CC	VBD	TO	VB	DT	NN	.
B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Eight	minutes	after	the	interval	,	Heerenveen	's	Romeo	Wouden	broke	through	the	Amsterdam	defence	,	left	defender	John	Veldman	standing	and	curled	the	ball	beyond	goalkeeper	Edwin	van	der	Sar	into	the	Ajax	net	.
CD	NNS	IN	DT	NN	,	NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NNP	VBP	,	VBD	NN	NNP	NNP	VBG	CC	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NN	NNP	NNP	FW	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O	O	B-ORG	O	O
Ajax	,	without	injured	defenders	Marcio	Santos	and	Winston	Bogarde	and	strikers	Jari	Litmanen	and	Marc	Overmars	,	then	stepped	up	the	pace	and	looked	certain	to	equalise	.
NNP	,	IN	JJ	NNS	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	CC	NNS	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	,	RB	VBN	RP	DT	NN	CC	VBD	JJ	TO	VB	.
B-ORG	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
But	they	left	gaps	at	the	back	and	on	73	minutes	Danish	striker	Jon	Dahl	Tomasson	rushed	out	of	his	own	half	,	beat	the	Ajax	defence	and	lobbed	van	der	Sar	.
CC	PRP	VBD	NNS	IN	DT	NN	CC	IN	CD	NNS	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	,	VBD	DT	NNP	VBP	CC	VBD	NNP	FW	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O
The	defeat	means	Ajax	's	main	title	contenders	PSV	Eindhoven	,	who	beat	the	champions	3-0	in	the	traditional	league	curtain-raiser	,	can	go	three	points	clear	of	their	rivals	if	they	beat	Groningen	on	Sunday	.

Hong	Kong	Financial	Secretary	Donald	Tsang	said	on	Thursday	he	expected	the	territory	's	economy	to	keep	growing	at	around	five	percent	but	with	some	fluctuations	from	year	to	year	.

The	State	(	central	)	Bank	of	Pakistan	auctioned	three-	,	five-	and	10-year	federal	investment	bonds	worth	1.38	billion	rupees	on	Tuesday	.

Mahammad	Rashid	was	whisked	from	Korydallos	maximum	security	prison	just	outside	Athens	to	the	airport	where	he	boarded	a	regular	Olympic	Airways	flight	to	Cairo	where	he	would	transit	to	Tunis	and	the	former	Palestine	Liberation	Organisation	headquarters	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	VBN	IN	NNP	NN	NN	NN	RB	IN	NNP	TO	DT	NN	WRB	PRP	JJ	DT	JJ	NNP	NNPS	NN	TO	NNP	WRB	PRP	MD	VB	TO	NNP	CC	DT	JJ	NNP	NNP	NNP	NN	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O
Rashid	,	46	,	was	sentenced	to	18	years	in	prison	by	a	Greek	court	in	1992	after	being	convicted	of	premeditated	murder	in	the	mid-air	bombing	of	a	Pan	American	airliner	in	1982	.

In	a	gloomy	Geneva	conference	centre	built	before	the	dawn	of	the	Internet	,	groups	of	staid	officials	made	a	first	stab	on	Friday	at	rewriting	copyright	laws	for	the	digital	age	.

Pre-electoral	bickering	flared	on	Wednesday	in	the	troubled	western	Mexican	state	of	Guerrero	as	some	opposition	politicians	demanded	the	army	pull	out	of	the	area	ahead	of	an	upcoming	state	poll	.

The	mayor	of	Acatepec	,	a	small	town	some	310	miles	(	500	km	)	south	of	Mexico	City	,	sent	a	letter	to	Mexico	's	National	Human	Rights	Commission	complaining	the	army	's	heavy	presence	in	the	town	would	interfere	with	the	Oct.	6	election	.

Thailand	's	powerful	military	thinks	the	government	is	dishonest	and	Prime	Minister	Banharn	Silpa-archa	's	resignation	might	solve	the	nation	's	political	and	economic	woes	,	an	opinion	poll	showed	on	Thursday	.

U.S.	investors	in	troubled	Lloyd	's	of	London	were	considering	late	on	Tuesday	whether	to	appeal	a	U.S.	court	decision	in	favour	of	Lloyd	's	and	pledged	to	continue	pursuing	other	legal	actions	.
NNP	NNS	IN	JJ	NNP	POS	IN	NNP	VBD	VBG	RB	RB	NNP	IN	TO	VB	DT	NNP	NN	NN	IN	NN	IN	NNP	POS	CC	VBD	TO	VB	VBG	JJ	JJ	NNS	.

A	U.S.	appeals	court	on	Tuesday	gave	Lloyd	's	a	reprieve	,	throwing	out	an	injunction	that	the	insurance	giant	said	could	have	led	to	its	collapse	.
DT	NNP	NNS	NN	IN	NNP	VBD	NNP	VBZ	DT	NN	,	VBG	RP	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	NN	VBD	MD	VB	VBN	TO	PRP$	NN	.

A	lower	court	issued	the	injunction	on	Friday	and	ordered	Lloyd	's	to	give	investors	,	known	as	Names	,	more	information	before	requiring	them	to	decide	whether	to	accept	a	settlement	offer	as	part	of	a	reorganisation	plan	.

Sachin	Tendulkar	marked	his	debut	as	Indian	captain	with	a	patient	110	on	Wednesday	,	but	was	upstaged	by	dashing	Sri	Lankan	opener	Sanath	Jayasuriya	whose	120	steered	the	world	champions	to	a	nine-wicket	Singer	Cup	win	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP$	NN	IN	NN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	CD	IN	NNP	,	CC	VBD	VBN	IN	VBG	NNP	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	WP$	CD	VBD	DT	NN	VBZ	TO	DT	JJ	NNP	NNP	VB	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O
Sri	Lanka	,	playing	in	front	of	their	home	crowd	for	the	first	time	since	winning	the	World	Cup	last	March	,	comfortably	passed	India	's	modest	226-5	from	50	overs	in	44.2	overs	.
NNP	NNP	,	VBG	IN	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	DT	NNP	NNP	JJ	NNP	,	RB	VBD	NNP	POS	JJ	CD	IN	CD	NNS	IN	CD	NNS	.
B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	devastating	opening	pair	of	Jayasuriya	and	Romesh	Kaluwitharana	shared	a	fine	first	wicket	stand	of	129	to	the	delight	of	the	25,000	fans	.
DT	VBG	NN	NN	IN	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	IN	CD	TO	DT	NN	IN	DT	CD	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Jayasuriya	,	whose	first	50	included	three	sixes	and	three	fours	,	went	on	to	an	unbeaten	120	and	the	man-of-the-match	award	.
NNP	,	WP$	JJ	CD	VBD	CD	NNS	CC	CD	NNS	,	VBD	IN	TO	DT	JJ	CD	CC	DT	NN	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Kaluwitharana	,	slow	in	comparison	,	was	bowled	by	Tendulkar	for	53	,	but	Aravinda	de	Silva	with	49	not	out	helped	see	Sri	Lanka	home	.
NNP	,	JJ	IN	NN	,	VBD	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	CD	,	CC	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	CD	RB	RP	VBN	VB	NNP	NNP	NN	.

Earlier	,	Tendulkar	completed	his	ninth	century	in	one-day	cricket	,	taking	138	balls	to	do	it	before	being	run	out	.

O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	rest	of	the	Indian	batting	was	generally	tied	down	by	brilliant	fielding	and	some	fairly	tight	bowling	,	although	ex-captain	Mohamed	Azharuddin	chipped	in	with	58	,	adding	129	with	Tendulkar	off	28	overs	,	before	being	stumped	.

-	Princeton	Lyman	,	the	U.S.	Under-Secretary	of	State	for	International	Organisations	,	will	on	Wednesday	continue	his	work	in	Angola	visiting	Bailundo	,	where	he	should	be	received	by	Jonas	Savimbi	,	leader	of	Unita	.
:	NNP	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NN	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	,	MD	IN	NNP	VB	PRP$	NN	IN	NNP	VBG	NNP	,	WRB	PRP	MD	VB	VBN	IN	NNP	NNP	,	NN	IN	NNP	.

On	Tuesday	Lyman	participated	in	a	meeting	of	a	joint-commission	where	he	considered	that	the	Angolan	politicians	should	advance	faster	and	find	a	way	to	cooperate	.
IN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	WRB	PRP	VBD	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	MD	VB	RBR	CC	VB	DT	NN	TO	VB	.
O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
In	his	opinion	the	quartering	of	Unita	forces	must	be	concluded	in	all	the	Angolan	territory	and	the	troops	must	be	selected	and	integrated	in	the	armed	forces	,	the	government	forces	must	be	concentrated	in	the	principal	units	and	the	free	circulation	of	people	and	goods	must	be	reality	in	all	the	country	.

South	Africa	's	Truth	and	Reconciliation	Commission	said	on	Wednesday	it	would	subpoena	persons	accused	of	human	rights	violations	to	appear	before	it	.
NNP	NNP	POS	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	PRP	MD	VB	NNS	VBN	IN	JJ	NNS	NNS	TO	VB	IN	PRP	.

"	We	can	subpoena	anyone	we	want	to	,	even	the	president	of	the	country	,	"	spokesman	John	Allen	told	Reuters	.	"
"	PRP	MD	VB	NN	PRP	VBP	TO	,	RB	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	,	"	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	.	"

Subpoenas	are	due	to	be	served	on	a	number	of	people	this	week	.	"
NNS	VBP	JJ	TO	VB	VBN	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNS	DT	NN	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Media	reports	have	speculated	that	the	commission	,	which	is	trying	to	heal	the	wounds	of	apartheid	by	confronting	the	past	,	could	subpoena	apartheid-era	President	P.W.	Botha	and	former	police	generals	Basie	Smit	and	Johan	Van	Der	Merwe	.

O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O
In	submissions	last	week	to	the	commission	National	Party	leader	and	former	president	F.W.	De	Klerk	said	he	had	received	no	co-operation	from	Botha	in	compiling	his	party	's	report	.
IN	NN	JJ	NN	TO	DT	NN	NNP	NNP	NN	CC	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP	VBD	VBN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	IN	VBG	PRP$	NN	POS	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Since	it	began	work	in	April	the	commission	has	been	hearing	harrowing	tales	from	the	victims	of	apartheid-era	abuses	,	by	both	the	white	minority	regime	and	its	opponents	.
IN	PRP	VBD	NN	IN	NNP	DT	NN	VBZ	VBN	VBG	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NNS	IN	JJ	NNS	,	IN	DT	DT	JJ	NN	NN	CC	PRP$	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
It	also	wants	to	hear	from	those	who	committed	the	abuses	,	to	whom	it	can	offer	amnesty	in	return	for	frankness	.
PRP	RB	VBZ	TO	VB	IN	DT	WP	VBN	DT	NNS	,	TO	WP	PRP	MD	VB	NN	IN	NN	IN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Hopes	that	reformed	perpetrators	would	come	forward	voluntarily	have	faded	but	the	commission	has	the	legal	power	to	force	them	to	appear	.
NNS	IN	VBN	NNS	MD	VB	RB	RB	VBP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	VBZ	DT	JJ	NN	TO	VB	PRP	TO	VB	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Allen	declined	to	give	say	who	would	be	subpoenaed	.

-	Chelsea	Clinton	,	until	now	carefully	shielded	from	the	exposure	of	public	life	,	made	her	political	debut	on	Sunday	on	her	father	's	whistlestop	train	trip	.

"	Although	,	if	we	did	get	someone	that	was	seen	as	looking	for	a	dollar	depreciation	,	it	would	probably	hurt	capital	flows	to	the	United	States	,	"	said	Widness	,	adding	that	could	hurt	U.S.	stocks	and	,	to	a	lesser	degree	,	bonds	.

O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Still	,	markets	may	have	little	to	fear	from	any	Rubin	successor	because	the	firm	dollar	policy	has	yielded	positive	results	.
RB	,	NNS	MD	VB	JJ	TO	VB	IN	DT	NNP	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	NN	VBZ	VBN	JJ	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
If	that	is	true	,	then	any	new	Treasury	chief	would	need	to	be	as	effective	as	Rubin	in	convincing	markets	that	the	White	House	does	indeed	want	a	strong	currency	.

"	If	he	left	,	the	first	question	people	would	ask	the	next	guy	is	,	'	What	's	your	view	on	the	dollar	?	'

O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	said	Michael	Perelstein	,	portfolio	manager	of	MainStay	International	Funds	.

Centre	Jason	Little	will	miss	Australia	's	end-of-tour	fixture	against	the	Barbarians	at	Twickenham	on	Saturday	.

Little	has	opted	not	to	risk	aggravating	the	knee	injury	which	ruled	him	out	of	a	large	chunk	of	the	tour	and	is	replaced	by	fellow	Queenslander	Daniel	Herbert	.

I	think	it	's	fair	to	give	them	a	chance	,	"	he	told	reporters	.

Dutch	co-operative	bank	Rabobank	Nederland	BA	's	net	profit	growth	might	slow	to	less	than	than	10	year	percent	in	the	second	half	of	1996	,	executive	board	chairman	Herman	Wijffels	said	on	Monday	.
JJ	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NN	MD	VB	TO	JJR	IN	IN	CD	NN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	CD	,	JJ	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	.

The	unlisted	bank	earlier	announced	a	1996	interim	net	profit	of	853	million	guilders	,	up	21.5	percent	on	the	702	million	guilders	reported	in	the	first	half	of	1995	.
DT	JJ	NN	RB	VBD	DT	CD	JJ	JJ	NN	IN	CD	CD	NNS	,	RB	CD	NN	IN	DT	CD	CD	NNS	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	CD	.

He	said	second-half	profit	growth	would	depend	on	customer	demand	for	loans	,	which	was	already	easing	,	and	the	performance	of	financial	markets	,	which	were	strong	in	the	first	half	and	boosted	securities	,	trading	and	underwriting	income	.

NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	NNP	NNP	TO	DT	"	CD	"	NN	IN	PRP$	JJ	"	CD	"	,	NN	NNS	VBD	IN	NNP	.

Softbank	Corp	said	on	Friday	that	it	would	procure	$	900	million	through	the	foreign	exchange	market	by	September	5	as	part	of	its	acquisition	of	U.S.	firm	,	Kingston	Technology	Co	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	IN	PRP	MD	NN	$	CD	CD	IN	DT	JJ	NN	NN	IN	NNP	CD	IN	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	IN	NNP	NN	,	NNP	NNP	NNP	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O
"	It	is	in	the	contract	that	we	pay	(	Kingston	)	$	900	million	by	September	5	,	"	he	said	,	adding	that	Softbank	had	already	started	making	forward	transactions	to	buy	dollars	.
"	PRP	VBZ	IN	DT	NN	IN	PRP	VBP	(	NNP	)	$	CD	CD	IN	NNP	CD	,	"	PRP	VBD	,	VBG	IN	NNPS	VBD	RB	VBD	VBG	RB	NNS	TO	VB	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
On	August	15	,	computer	software	retailer	Softbank	said	it	would	buy	80	percent	of	Kingston	,	the	world	's	largest	maker	of	memory	boards	,	for	about	$	1.5	billion	in	the	latest	in	a	series	of	high-profile	acquisitions	it	has	made	in	the	United	States	.

A	Chinese	truck	maker	in	which	Ford	Motor	Co	has	a	20	percent	stake	said	it	posted	a	77	percent	drop	in	post-tax	profits	in	the	first	half	of	1996	.

Dutch	forward	Reggie	Blinker	had	his	indefinite	suspension	lifted	by	FIFA	on	Friday	and	was	set	to	make	his	Sheffield	Wednesday	comeback	against	Liverpool	on	Saturday	.
JJ	JJ	NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP$	JJ	NN	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	CC	VBD	VBN	TO	VB	PRP$	NNP	NNP	NN	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	.

Blinker	missed	his	club	's	last	two	games	after	FIFA	slapped	a	worldwide	ban	on	him	for	appearing	to	sign	contracts	for	both	Wednesday	and	Udinese	while	he	was	playing	for	Feyenoord	.

FIFA	's	players	'	status	committee	,	meeting	in	Barcelona	,	decided	that	although	the	Udinese	document	was	basically	valid	,	it	could	not	be	legally	protected	.

The	tiny	islands	of	the	Seychelles	failed	to	make	soccer	history	at	the	weekend	when	they	bowed	out	of	the	preliminary	rounds	of	the	African	Nations	Cup	.
DT	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NNP	VBD	TO	VB	NN	NN	IN	DT	NN	WRB	PRP	VBD	IN	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NNP	NNPS	NNP	.

Trailing	fellow	Indian	Ocean	islanders	Mauritius	1-0	from	the	first	leg	,	they	were	held	to	a	1-1	draw	at	home	on	Saturday	despite	playing	against	10	men	for	most	of	the	match	.

The	2-1	aggregate	took	Mauritius	into	the	group	phase	of	the	qualifiers	for	the	1998	finals	,	and	kept	up	the	Seychelles	'	record	of	never	having	won	an	official	match	in	their	10	years	of	FIFA	membership	.

CYCLING	-	FERRIGATO	SPRINTS	TO	SECOND	STRAIGHT	WORLD	CUP	WIN	.
VBG	:	TO	NNS	TO	NNP	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O
ZURICH	1996-08-25
WDT	CD
B-LOC	O
Andrea	Ferrigato	of	Italy	sprinted	to	his	second	cycling	World	Cup	win	in	successive	weekends	with	victory	in	the	Swiss	Grand	Prix	on	Sunday	.
NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	VBD	TO	PRP$	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	VB	IN	JJ	NNS	IN	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O
Ferrigato	,	winner	of	the	Leeds	Classic	last	Sunday	with	a	one	second	win	over	Britain	's	Max	Sciandri	,	posted	a	similarly	narrow	margin	of	victory	again	.
JJ	,	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	JJ	NNP	IN	DT	CD	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	,	VBD	DT	RB	JJ	NN	IN	NN	RB	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	26-year-old	Italian	surged	past	compatriot	Michele	Bartoli	and	last	year	's	winner	and	defending	World	Cup	champion	Johan	Museeuw	of	Belgium	in	the	final	few	metres	of	the	237km	race	.
DT	JJ	JJ	VBD	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	CC	JJ	NN	POS	NN	CC	VBG	NNP	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
All	three	clocked	the	same	time	of	five	hours	51	minutes	,	52	seconds	.
DT	CD	VBN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	CD	NNS	CD	NNS	,	CD	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Former	world	champion	Lance	Armstrong	of	the	United	States	was	in	front	as	the	leading	pack	of	seven	riders	turned	into	the	Oerlikon	velodrome	for	the	final	one	lap	sprint	but	quickly	faded	and	settled	for	fourth	.

The	back-to-back	wins	vault	Ferrigato	from	sixth	to	second	in	the	overall	World	Cup	rankings	with	112	points	but	Museeuw	continues	to	hold	a	commanding	lead	with	162	points	after	eight	of	the	11	rounds	.

TENNIS	-	EDBERG	EXTENDS	GRAND	SLAM	RUN	,	TOPPLES	WIMBLEDON	CHAMP	.
NNS	:	NNP	NNPS	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	VBN	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O
Larry	Fine
NNP	NNP
B-PER	I-PER
NEW	YORK	1996-08-27
NNP	NNP	CD
B-LOC	I-LOC	O
Stefan	Edberg	produced	some	of	his	vintage	best	on	Tuesday	to	extend	his	grand	run	at	the	Grand	Slams	by	toppling	Wimbledon	champion	Richard	Krajicek	in	straight	sets	at	the	U.S.	Open	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	IN	PRP$	NN	JJS	IN	NNP	TO	VB	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNPS	IN	VBG	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	B-MISC	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O
Edberg	,	competing	in	the	54th	consecutive	and	final	Grand	Slam	event	of	his	illustrious	career	,	turned	back	the	clock	at	Stadium	Court	with	a	flowing	6-3	6-3	6-3	serve-and-volley	victory	over	the	fifth-seeded	Dutchman	.
RB	,	VBG	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	CC	JJ	NNP	NNP	NN	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	,	VBD	RB	DT	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	VBG	JJ	CD	CD	JJ	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NNP	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O
"	It	's	a	win	that	I	can	be	proud	of	,	"	said	the	30-year-old	Swede	,	winner	of	two	U.S.	Opens	and	six	Grand	Slam	titles	in	all	.	"
"	PRP	VBZ	DT	VBP	IN	PRP	MD	VB	JJ	IN	,	"	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	,	NN	IN	CD	NNP	NNP	CC	CD	NNP	NNP	NNS	IN	DT	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O
It	's	never	easy	to	beat	the	Wimbledon	champion	.	"
PRP	VBZ	RB	JJ	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O
Edberg	,	who	has	said	he	will	retire	at	season	's	end	,	made	it	look	easy	under	gray	skies	at	the	National	Tennis	Centre	.
RB	,	WP	VBZ	VBD	PRP	MD	VB	IN	NN	POS	NN	,	VBD	PRP	VBP	JJ	IN	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	I-LOC	O
The	unseeded	Swede	struck	quickly	,	breaking	Krajicek	in	the	first	game	and	never	let	loose	his	grip	on	the	one	hour	44	minute	match	as	he	served	and	volleyed	with	the	grace	that	made	him	one	of	the	dominant	players	of	his	time	.
DT	JJ	NN	VBD	RB	,	VBG	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	CC	RB	VB	RB	PRP$	NN	IN	DT	CD	NN	CD	NN	NN	IN	PRP	VBD	CC	VBD	IN	DT	NN	WDT	VBD	PRP	CD	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	IN	PRP$	NN	.
O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	There	's	not	doubt	about	it	,	Richard	was	definitely	off	his	game	and	I	took	advantage	,	"	said	Edberg	.
"	EX	VBZ	RB	VB	IN	PRP	,	NNP	VBD	RB	RP	PRP$	NN	CC	PRP	VBD	NN	,	"	VBD	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O
"	I	still	have	my	days	where	I	feel	great	out	there	.	"
"	PRP	RB	VBP	PRP$	NNS	WRB	PRP	VB	JJ	IN	RB	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Also	reaching	the	second	round	were	top-seeded	defending	champion	Pete	Sampras	,	a	6-2	6-2	6-1	winner	over	last	minute	replacement	Jimy	Szymanski	of	Venezuela	,	called	on	after	Adrian	Voinea	of	Romania	withdrew	because	of	a	sprained	ankle	.

Chinese	girl	nearly	dies	from	cigarette	smoke	.
JJ	NN	RB	VBZ	IN	NN	NN	.
B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
SHANGHAI	1996-12-06
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
A	five-year-old	girl	in	the	east	China	city	of	Tianjin	choked	and	almost	died	from	cigarette	smoke	at	her	grandfather	's	birthday	with	relatives	smoking	for	hours	in	a	small	room	,	the	Wen	Hui	Bao	newspaper	said	on	Friday	.

The	newspaper	said	the	girl	was	rushed	to	hospital	and	found	to	be	having	extreme	difficulty	breathing	.
DT	NN	VBD	DT	NN	VBD	VBN	TO	NN	CC	VBD	TO	VB	VBG	JJ	NN	NN	.

It	said	eight	of	the	people	at	the	party	,	including	the	girl	's	father	,	immediately	announced	they	would	give	up	smoking	.

Foreign	planes	to	land	in	China	's	popular	Guilin	.

BEIJING	1996-12-06
VBG	CD
B-LOC	O
China	's	tourist	spot	of	Guilin	in	the	southern	region	of	Guangxi	will	open	its	airport	to	foreign	aircraft	,	the	Xinhua	news	agency	said	on	Friday	.
NNP	POS	NN	NN	IN	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	MD	VB	PRP$	NN	TO	JJ	NN	,	DT	NNP	NN	NN	VBD	IN	NNP	.

An	assessment	group	made	up	of	the	State	Council	's	Port	Office	,	the	Civil	Aviation	Administration	of	China	,	the	General	Administration	of	Customs	and	other	authorities	had	granted	the	airport	permission	to	handle	foreign	aircraft	,	Xinhua	said	.
DT	NN	NN	VBD	RP	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	CC	JJ	NNS	VBD	VBN	DT	NN	NN	TO	VB	JJ	NN	,	NNP	VBD	.

"	The	move	is	expected	to	give	a	shot	in	the	arm	to	the	economic	expansion	of	Guangxi	and	southwest	China	as	a	whole	,	"	the	agency	said	but	gave	no	further	details	.
"	DT	NN	VBZ	VBN	TO	VB	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	TO	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	CC	NN	NNP	IN	DT	NN	,	"	DT	NN	VBD	CC	VBD	DT	JJ	NNS	.

FEATURE	-	Singapore	sees	prestige	in	hosting	WTO	.

SINGAPORE	1996-12-06
JJR	CD
B-LOC	O
Singapore	's	winning	campaign	to	host	the	World	Trade	Organisation	(	WTO	)	's	first	ministerial	meeting	reflected	its	ambition	to	play	a	key	role	in	shaping	global	free	trade	,	the	lifeblood	of	its	economy	,	analysts	said	.
NNP	POS	NN	NN	TO	VB	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NN	)	POS	JJ	JJ	NN	VBD	PRP$	NN	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	JJ	JJ	NN	,	DT	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	,	NNS	VBD	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	As	one	of	the	world	's	most	externally	oriented	economies	,	Singapore	has	a	disproportionately	large	stake	in	the	WTO	,	"	said	Desmond	Supple	,	economist	at	research	house	I.D.E.A	.
"	IN	CD	IN	DT	NN	VBZ	RBS	RB	VBN	NNS	,	NNP	VBZ	DT	NN	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NNP	,	"	VBD	NNP	NNP	,	NN	IN	NN	NN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O
"	Singapore	stands	to	benefit	more	than	most	from	continued	global	trade	liberalisation	as	trade	is	the	engine	of	its	growth	,	accounting	for	nearly	three	times	its	gross	domestic	product	.	"
"	NNP	VBZ	TO	VB	JJR	IN	RBS	IN	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	IN	NN	VBZ	DT	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	,	VBG	IN	RB	CD	NNS	PRP$	JJ	JJ	NN	.	"
O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	city-state	met	U.S.	opposition	two	years	ago	in	its	bid	to	host	the	meeting	,	expected	to	gather	4,000	officials	from	160	countries	from	December	9	to	13	.

Derek	da	Cunha	,	senior	fellow	at	the	Institute	of	Policy	Studies	(	ISEAS	)	,	said	Singapore	's	hosting	of	the	conference	"	carries	a	great	deal	of	symbolism	for	the	city-state	,	underscoring	its	commitment	to	free	trade	and	its	trading	links	across	the	globe	.	"

There	is	the	international	prestige	Singapore	would	enjoy	,	but	"	more	importantly	there	is	a	genuine	national	interest	in	fostering	better	global	free	trade	and	an	open	market	"	,	said	Tan	Kong	Yam	,	head	of	Business	Policy	at	the	National	University	of	Singapore	.

In	June	,	the	WTO	hailed	Singapore	for	its	open	market	policies	but	the	European	Union	and	other	trading	powers	called	on	Singapore	to	speed	up	the	opening	of	its	services	sector	.

A	U.S.	fighter	plane	blew	a	tyre	and	caught	fire	while	landing	on	Sunday	at	Israel	's	Ben	Gurion	airport	,	an	airport	spokesman	said	.

Egypt	hopes	jars	will	reveal	secrets	of	mummies	.
NNP	VBZ	NNS	MD	VB	NNS	IN	NNS	.

CAIRO	1996-08-25
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Archaeologists	in	Egypt	have	found	pots	used	by	ancient	Egyptians	in	burial	rites	that	they	say	may	reveal	the	secrets	of	mummification	.
NNP	IN	NNP	VBP	VBN	NNS	VBN	IN	JJ	NN	IN	NN	NNS	IN	PRP	VBP	MD	VB	DT	NNS	IN	NN	.
O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Mohammed	Saleh	,	director	of	the	Egyptian	Museum	,	told	Reuters	television	a	U.S.	team	found	the	pots	,	some	of	which	contain	human	intestines	,	in	a	tomb	built	into	the	rocks	while	digging	in	Dahshour	,	a	village	40	km	(	25	miles	)	south	of	Cairo	.
NNP	NNP	,	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	,	VBD	NNP	NN	DT	NNP	NN	VBD	DT	NNS	,	DT	IN	WDT	VBP	JJ	NNS	,	IN	DT	NN	VBN	IN	DT	NNS	IN	VBG	IN	NNP	,	DT	NN	CD	NN	(	CD	NNS	)	RB	IN	NNP	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O
Dahshour	is	the	site	of	Egypt	's	second	largest	pyramid	,	built	for	the	pharaoh	Seneferu	more	than	4,500	years	ago	.
NN	VBZ	DT	NN	IN	NNP	POS	JJ	JJS	VB	,	VBN	IN	DT	NN	NNP	JJR	IN	CD	NNS	RB	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O
Saleh	said	the	team	--	from	New	York	's	Metropolitan	Museum	--	found	four	Canopic	jars	and	two	unguent	jars	in	the	tomb	,	which	belongs	to	an	unidentifed	person	who	lived	during	the	12th	Dynasty	(	1991-1786	BC	)	in	the	Middle	Kingdom	.
NNP	VBD	DT	NN	:	IN	NNP	NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	:	VBD	CD	NNP	NNS	CC	CD	NN	NNS	IN	DT	NN	,	WDT	VBZ	TO	DT	JJ	NN	WP	VBD	IN	DT	JJ	NNP	(	CD	NN	)	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	.

"	This	finding	is	important	because	one	of	the	jars	still	contains	substances	and	materials	used	in	the	conservation	of	mummies	and	the	conservation	of	the	intestines	and	all	the	things	which	were	in	the	cavity	of	a	person	we	have	not	identified	yet	,	"	Saleh	said	.
"	DT	NN	VBZ	JJ	IN	CD	IN	DT	NNS	RB	VBZ	NNS	CC	NNS	VBN	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNS	CC	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	CC	PDT	DT	NNS	WDT	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	PRP	VBP	RB	VBN	RB	,	"	NNP	VBD	.

"	We	hope	that	the	analysis	of	such	substances	and	liquids	will	reveal	some	secrets	of	the	mummification	process	and	materials	used	in	this	process	,	"	he	added	.

BUENOS	AIRES	1996-08-26
NNP	NNPS	CD
B-LOC	I-LOC	O
Alejandro	Lanusse	,	the	former	dictator	who	ruled	Argentina	for	two	years	,	died	at	age	78	on	Monday	.
NNP	NNP	,	DT	JJ	NN	WP	VBD	NNP	IN	CD	NNS	,	VBD	IN	NN	CD	IN	NNP	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Lanusse	died	after	being	brought	to	a	hospital	a	week	ago	following	a	fall	at	home	that	resulted	in	a	blood	clot	in	the	brain	.
NNP	VBD	IN	VBG	VBN	TO	DT	NN	DT	NN	RB	VBG	DT	NN	IN	NN	WDT	VBD	IN	DT	NN	NN	IN	DT	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
He	was	operated	on	earlier	in	the	week	but	failed	to	recover	from	surgery	.
PRP	VBD	VBN	IN	JJR	IN	DT	NN	CC	VBD	TO	VB	IN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	former	dictator	,	who	ruled	from	1971	to	1973	,	was	best	known	for	allowing	Juan	Domingo	Peron	,	Argentina	's	famed	populist	leader	,	to	return	to	Argentina	after	17	years	of	forced	exile	.
DT	JJ	NN	,	WP	VBD	IN	CD	TO	CD	,	VBD	RBS	JJ	IN	VBG	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	NNP	POS	JJ	JJ	NN	,	TO	VB	TO	NNP	IN	CD	NNS	IN	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Lanusse	took	over	the	leadership	of	the	country	after	five	years	of	dictatorship	.
NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	CD	NNS	IN	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
But	unlike	his	two	predecessors	,	Juan	Carlos	Ongania	and	Marcelo	Levingston	,	who	ruled	Argentina	with	an	iron	hand	,	Lanusse	steered	the	country	toward	democracy	.
CC	IN	PRP$	CD	NNS	,	NNP	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	,	WP	VBD	NNP	IN	DT	NN	NN	,	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NN	.

That	resulted	in	general	elections	in	March	1973	when	the	Peronists	led	by	Hector	Campora	and	Vicente	Solano	Lima	returned	to	power	.

"	We	are	in	the	late	stages	of	the	weaker	period	of	the	market	,	and	as	we	get	to	the	post	Labor	Day	market	we	will	start	to	see	more	consumer	interest	and	the	demand	side	of	the	market	will	start	to	firm	prices	up	,	"	said	William	O'Neill	of	Merrill	Lynch	.

Average	daily	shipments	from	U.S.	copper	service	centers	in	July	fell	three	percent	from	the	previous	month	,	but	were	higher	than	in	July	1995	,	the	Copper	and	Brass	Servicenter	Association	reported	.
JJ	JJ	NNS	IN	NNP	NN	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	VBD	CD	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	,	CC	VBD	JJR	IN	IN	NNP	CD	,	DT	NN	CC	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	.
O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O
"	July	was	still	above	the	historic	average	for	that	month	,	"	the	CBSA	said	.
"	NNP	VBD	RB	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	,	"	DT	NNP	VBD	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O
In	the	first	seven	months	of	1996	,	shipments	of	copper	sheet	,	coil	and	strip	were	2.2	percent	ahead	of	the	same	period	last	year	.
IN	DT	JJ	CD	NNS	IN	CD	,	NNS	IN	NN	NN	,	NN	CC	NN	VBD	CD	NN	RB	IN	DT	JJ	NN	JJ	NN	.

Alloy	shipments	,	however	,	were	7.5	percent	down	.
NN	NNS	,	RB	,	VBD	CD	NN	RP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	Several	service	centers	indicated	that	while	their	volume	of	orders	remains	constant	,	the	size-per-order	continues	to	be	smaller	than	what	was	realised	during	the	first	five	months	of	the	year	,	"	the	CBSA	said	.

Chile	's	state	oil	company	Empresa	Nacional	del	Petroleo	(	ENAP	)	bought	a	second	spot	cargo	of	Oriente	and	nearly	one	million	barrels	of	Escravos	in	a	recent	tender	,	traders	said	Wednesday	.
NNP	POS	NN	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	FW	NNP	(	NNP	)	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	NN	IN	NNP	CC	RB	CD	CD	NNS	IN	NNPS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	,	NNS	VBD	NNP	.

1241	-	Alexander	III	,	King	of	Scotland	,	born	.
CD	:	NNP	NNP	,	NNP	IN	NNP	,	VBN	.
O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O
King	from	1249-1286	,	he	consolidated	royal	power	,	leaving	Scotland	united	and	independent	.
NNP	IN	CD	,	PRP	JJ	JJ	NN	,	VBG	NNP	VBN	CC	JJ	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O
1260	-	The	Ghibellines	retook	the	city	of	Florence	from	the	Florentine	Guelfs	at	the	battle	of	Monte	Aperto	.
CD	:	DT	NNPS	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NNP	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	.

1768	-	Francois-Rene	(	Vicomte	de	)	Chateaubriand	born	.
CD	:	JJ	(	NNP	NNP	)	NNP	VBN	.
O	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	I-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O	O
He	was	a	politician	,	one	of	the	first	French	romantic	writers	and	ambassador	to	the	British	court	.
PRP	VBD	DT	NN	,	CD	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	JJ	NNS	CC	NN	TO	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O
He	wrote	"	Rene	"	,	a	seminal	work	in	the	French	romantic	movement	and	a	famous	autobiography	"	Memoires	d'Outre	Tombe	"	.

The	European	Union	and	Poland	have	resolved	disagreements	over	a	new	Polish	oil	import	regime	,	the	European	Commission	said	on	Friday	.
DT	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	VBP	VBN	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	NN	,	DT	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	.
O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O
The	EU	had	objected	to	increases	in	Polish	tariffs	on	imports	of	gasoline	and	gasoil	products	introduced	on	January	1	,	1996	,	saying	they	contravened	levels	envisaged	in	the	so-called	Europe	Agreement	between	the	EU	and	Poland	.
DT	NNP	VBD	VBN	TO	NNS	IN	JJ	NNS	IN	NNS	IN	NN	CC	JJ	NNS	VBN	IN	NNP	CD	,	CD	,	VBG	PRP	VBN	NNS	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	CC	NNP	.
O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	B-ORG	O	B-LOC	O
The	increases	were	aimed	at	protecting	the	Polish	market	while	helping	to	modernise	the	local	oil	industry	.
DT	NNS	VBD	VBN	IN	VBG	DT	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	The	EU	and	Poland	have	now	reached	a	final	settlement	regarding	issues	related	to	the	Polish	import	regime	in	the	oils	sector	,	"	the	Commission	said	in	a	statement	.
"	DT	NNP	CC	NNP	VBP	RB	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	VBG	NNS	VBN	TO	DT	JJ	NN	NN	IN	DT	NNS	NN	,	"	DT	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	B-ORG	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O
Under	the	agreement	,	Poland	will	abolish	all	oil	import	tariffs	by	2001	,	remove	all	oil	price	controls	and	end	quantitative	restrictions	on	imports	by	January	1	,	1997	.
IN	DT	NN	,	NNP	MD	VB	DT	NN	NN	NNS	IN	CD	,	VB	DT	NN	NN	NNS	CC	VB	JJ	NNS	IN	NNS	IN	NNP	CD	,	CD	.

The	agreement	includes	the	early	privatisation	and	modernisation	of	Polish	oil	refineries	,	which	will	be	obliged	to	offer	equal	treatment	to	all	buyers	.

Hindu	nationalists	forced	adjournment	of	India	's	lower	house	of	parliament	on	Friday	,	in	protest	against	a	proposal	to	observe	a	minute	's	silence	over	the	destruction	of	a	mosque	by	a	Hindu	mob	in	1992	.

Spanish	bonds	,	which	had	been	top	performers	in	Salomon	Brothers	'	league	table	for	November	as	a	whole	,	turned	in	a	more	subdued	weekly	performance	with	a	return	of	only	0.27	percent	.

France	lost	0.37	percent	,	followed	by	Italy	on	minus	0.59	percent	.
NNP	VBD	CD	NN	,	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	CC	CD	NN	.

The	biggest	losers	in	dollar	terms	were	British	gilts	,	which	shed	3.41	percent	,	Canada	with	minus	3.03	percent	and	Australia	at	minus	1.54	percent	.

OPEC	basket	price	$	24.20	on	Thursday	.
NNP	NN	NN	$	CD	IN	NNP	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
LONDON	1996-12-06
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
The	price	of	the	OPEC	basket	of	seven	crudes	stood	at	$	24.20	a	barrel	on	Thursday	,	against	$	23.47	on	Wednesday	,	the	OPECNA	news	agency	said	,	quoting	the	OPEC	secretariat	.
DT	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NN	IN	CD	NNS	VBD	IN	$	CD	DT	NN	IN	NNP	,	IN	$	CD	IN	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NN	NN	VBD	,	VBG	DT	NNP	NN	.
O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O
The	basket	comprises	Algeria	's	Saharan	Blend	,	Indonesia	's	Minas	,	Nigeria	's	Bonny	Light	,	Saudi	Arabia	's	Arabian	Light	,	Dubai	of	the	UAE	,	Venezuela	's	Tia	Juana	and	Mexico	's	Isthmus	.

Relations	between	Clarke	,	Major	good	-	spokesman	.

Relations	between	Chancellor	of	the	Exchequer	Kenneth	Clarke	and	Prime	Minister	John	Major	are	good	despite	media	reports	of	a	rift	over	European	policy	,	a	spokesman	for	Major	's	office	said	on	Friday	.
NNS	IN	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBP	JJ	IN	NN	NNS	IN	DT	NN	IN	JJ	NN	,	DT	NN	IN	NNP	POS	NN	VBD	IN	NNP	.

Two	dead	after	executive	jet	crashes	in	Newfoundland	.
CD	JJ	IN	JJ	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O
STEPHENVILLE	,	Newfoundland	1996-12-06
RB	,	NNP	CD
O	O	B-LOC	O
Two	people	were	killed	when	an	executive	jet	en	route	to	Ireland	from	Michigan	crashed	on	approach	to	an	airport	in	Stephenville	,	Newfoundland	,	on	Friday	,	authorities	said	.
CD	NNS	VBD	VBN	WRB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NN	TO	NNP	IN	NNP	VBD	IN	NN	TO	DT	NN	IN	NNP	,	NNP	,	IN	NNP	,	NNS	VBD	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	pilot	and	co-pilot	,	the	only	two	aboard	,	were	killed	in	the	crash	of	the	Learjet	36	,	airport	manager	David	Snow	said	in	a	telephone	interview	.
DT	NN	CC	NNS	,	DT	JJ	CD	IN	,	VBD	VBN	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNP	CD	,	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	NN	.

Snow	said	the	plane	last	reported	to	air	traffic	control	at	about	3	A.M.	local	time	/	1:30	A.M.	EST	(	0630	GMT	)	when	it	began	its	final	approach	about	10	miles	(	16	km	)	from	the	airport	in	this	east	coast	Canadian	province	.

NNP	NNP	CD	NNP	NNP	CD
B-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O
Belgian	media	speculated	that	Dutroux	,	charged	with	abduction	and	illegal	imprisonment	of	children	,	must	have	had	high	level	protection	to	molest	youngsters	.
JJ	NNS	VBD	IN	NNP	,	VBN	IN	NN	CC	JJ	NN	IN	NNS	,	MD	VB	VBD	JJ	NN	NN	TO	VB	NNS	.
B-MISC	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
They	put	forward	no	proof	to	support	the	speculation	,	but	seized	on	a	comment	by	chief	prosecutor	Michel	Bourlet	on	Belgian	television	on	Friday	night	that	he	would	chase	down	everyone	involved	in	the	case	"	if	I	am	allowed	to	"	.
PRP	VBD	RB	DT	NN	TO	VB	DT	NN	,	CC	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	NN	IN	PRP	MD	VB	RP	NN	VBN	IN	DT	NN	"	IN	PRP	VBP	VBN	TO	"	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Bourlet	said	between	300	and	400	paedophile	porn	video	tapes	had	been	seized	,	some	of	which	featured	Dutroux	.
NNP	VBD	IN	CD	CC	CD	JJ	JJ	NN	NNS	VBD	VBN	VBN	,	DT	IN	WDT	VBD	NNP	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O
Dutroux	was	charged	a	week	ago	after	police	rescued	two	young	girls	from	a	concrete	dungeon	in	the	basement	of	one	of	the	six	houses	he	owns	in	and	around	Charleroi	.

Java	is	a	computer	programming	language	introduced	by	Sun	Microsystems	in	mid-1995	which	has	immediately	captured	the	attention	of	the	industry	for	its	ability	to	operate	across	virtually	all	computer	system	in	a	relatively	secure	manner	.

One	feature	of	the	Java	language	is	that	small	software	programmes	,	known	as	"	applets	"	because	they	are	small	applications	,	can	be	downloaded	from	the	server	computers	at	the	centre	of	networks	onto	individual	computers	for	use	.

In	this	model	,	individual	computer	users	can	always	gain	access	to	the	latest	programmes	and	do	not	need	to	store	more	software	than	they	are	currently	using	on	their	computers	at	any	one	time	,	also	saving	costs	of	memory	and	storage	.

The	National	Basketball	Association	has	sued	America	Online	Inc	,	alleging	that	the	United	States	'	No	1	on-line	service	is	delivering	real-time	information	about	league	games	without	its	permission	,	The	Wall	Street	Journal	reported	on	Thursday	.
DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBZ	VBN	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	VBG	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	POS	DT	CD	JJ	NN	VBZ	VBG	JJ	NN	IN	NN	NNS	IN	PRP$	NN	,	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	.
O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O
The	suit	was	filed	on	Wednesday	in	federal	court	in	Manhattan	and	is	another	legal	skirmish	over	what	constitutes	a	"	broadcast	"	in	the	computer	age	.
DT	NN	VBD	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	CC	VBZ	DT	JJ	NN	IN	WP	VBZ	DT	"	NN	"	IN	DT	NN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	suit	contends	America	Online	was	misappropriating	NBA	property	by	providing	a	site	containing	continually	updated	scores	and	statistics	of	NBA	games	in	progress	.

DUTCH	CAPTAIN	BLIND	ENDS	INTERNATIONAL	CAREER	.
VB	NNP	NNP	NNPS	NNP	NNP	.
B-MISC	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O
AMSTERDAM	1996-08-25
NN	CD
B-LOC	O
Dutch	soccer	captain	Danny	Blind	has	decided	to	end	his	international	career	,	Ajax	spokesman	David	Endt	said	on	Sunday	.
JJ	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	VBZ	VBN	TO	VB	PRP$	JJ	NN	,	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	.
B-MISC	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O
Endt	told	Dutch	news	agency	ANP	that	Blind	,	35	,	would	no	longer	be	available	for	selection	for	the	national	squad	.

Indian	opener	Navjot	Singh	Sidhu	was	on	Sunday	given	a	50-day	ban	from	international	cricket	for	quitting	this	year	's	tour	of	England	,	the	Press	Trust	of	India	said	.
JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	VBN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	DT	NN	POS	NN	IN	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	VBD	.

The	right-handed	batsman	will	have	to	forfeit	half	the	money	he	was	due	to	earn	from	the	tour	,	the	news	agency	said	after	a	disciplinary	committee	set	up	by	the	Board	of	Control	for	Cricket	in	India	met	at	Mohali	,	near	the	northern	city	of	Chandigarh	.

Above-normal	summer	rainfall	in	the	U.S.	High	Plains	has	produced	near-ideal	conditions	for	planting	the	1997	hard	red	winter	wheat	crop	,	analysts	said	Wednesday	.

From	central	Texas	north	to	Kansas	,	rains	throughout	July	and	August	have	relieved	most	of	the	drought	conditions	that	plagued	the	region	earlier	this	year	.

State	and	federal	agents	on	Thursday	sifted	through	the	rubble	of	two	predominantly	black	Arkansas	churches	that	burned	within	minutes	of	one	another	late	Tuesday	and	early	Wednesday	.

NNP	CD

From	the	people	who	brought	you	hundreds	of	"	yogic	fliers	"	who	claimed	to	defy	nature	by	levitating	comes	The	Natural	Law	Party	,	a	minor	political	party	that	nominated	a	presidential	candidate	on	Thursday	.

A	year	after	its	massively	publicized	introduction	,	Microsoft	Corp.	's	Windows	95	computer	operating	system	has	fallen	short	of	the	most	optimistic	expectations	for	the	software	giant	and	the	industry	.

Even	though	more	than	40	million	copies	of	Windows	95	have	been	sold	,	making	it	the	fastest-selling	new	software	ever	,	it	would	have	been	impossible	for	any	product	to	live	up	to	the	unprecedented	hype	of	the	Aug.	24	,	1995	launch	,	when	stores	around	the	world	opened	at	midnight	to	greet	long	lines	of	customers	.

Ecological	warfare	has	broken	out	across	the	British	construction	industry	,	striking	some	of	the	biggest	corporates	as	activists	give	up	peaceful	protests	and	seek	to	hit	builders	where	it	hurts	--	their	profit	margins	.

Ukraine	hails	peace	as	marks	five-year	independence	.
NNP	VBZ	NN	IN	NNS	JJ	NN	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Rostislav	Khotin
NNP	NNP
B-PER	I-PER
KIEV	1996-08-23
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Ukraine	celebrates	five	years	of	independence	from	Kremlin	rule	on	Saturday	,	hailing	civil	and	inter-ethnic	peace	as	its	main	post-Soviet	achievement	.
NNP	VBZ	CD	NNS	IN	NN	IN	NNP	NN	IN	NNP	,	VBG	JJ	CC	JJ	NN	IN	PRP$	JJ	JJ	NN	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O
Ukraine	's	declaration	of	independence	in	1991	,	backed	nine-to-one	by	a	referendum	in	December	of	that	year	,	effectively	dealt	a	death	blow	to	the	Soviet	empire	and	ended	more	than	three	centuries	of	rule	from	Moscow	.
NNP	POS	NN	IN	NN	IN	CD	,	VBD	RB	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	IN	DT	NN	,	RB	VBN	DT	NN	NN	TO	DT	JJ	NN	CC	VBD	JJR	IN	CD	NNS	IN	NN	IN	NNP	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O
Ukraine	,	with	a	Russian	community	of	11	million	people	--	the	world	's	largest	outside	Russia	--	has	avoided	conflicts	like	those	in	Russia	's	Chechnya	,	neighbouring	Moldova	,	and	the	former	Soviet	republics	of	Georgia	,	Azerbaijan	and	Tajikistan	.

A	16th-century	document	,	the	earliest	complete	example	of	written	Albanian	,	has	disappeared	from	the	Vatican	archives	,	an	Albanian	newspaper	said	on	Friday	.

Russian	officials	,	keen	to	cut	capital	flight	,	will	adopt	tight	measures	to	cut	barter	deals	in	foreign	trade	to	a	minimum	,	a	customs	official	said	on	Friday	.
JJ	NNS	,	JJ	TO	VB	NN	NN	,	MD	VB	JJ	NNS	TO	VB	NN	NNS	IN	JJ	NN	TO	DT	NN	,	DT	NNS	NN	VBD	IN	NNP	.

"	We	have	always	been	concerned	about	barter	deals	with	other	countries	,	viewing	them	as	a	disguised	kind	of	capital	flight	from	Russia	,	"	Marina	Volkova	,	deputy	head	of	the	currency	department	at	the	State	Customs	Committee	,	told	Reuters	.

In	line	with	the	decree	,	which	will	come	into	force	on	November	1	,	all	Russian	barter	traders	will	be	obliged	to	import	goods	worth	the	cost	of	their	exports	within	180	days	.

Barter	has	always	been	a	feature	of	the	Soviet	Union	's	foreign	trade	,	but	Yeltsin	's	decrees	liberalising	foreign	trade	in	1991-1992	has	given	barter	a	new	impetus	.
JJ	VBZ	RB	VBN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	,	CC	NNP	POS	VBZ	VBG	JJ	NN	IN	NN	VBZ	VBN	VB	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
A	few	years	ago	,	barter	deals	accounted	for	up	to	25-30	percent	of	Russian	exports	because	"	thousands	(	of	)	trade	companies	which	popped	up	preferred	barter	in	the	absence	of	reliable	Russian	banks	and	money	transfer	systems	"	,	Volkova	said	.

BEIJING	1996-08-27
VBG	CD
B-LOC	O
China	on	Tuesday	reaffirmed	its	support	for	a	global	nuclear	test	ban	treaty	blocked	by	India	last	week	,	saying	the	pact	would	be	an	important	step	in	achieving	total	nuclear	disarmament	.
NNP	IN	NNP	VBD	PRP$	NN	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	NN	VBN	IN	NNP	JJ	NN	,	VBG	DT	NN	MD	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	JJ	JJ	NN	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	Although	the	final	draft	of	the	treaty	probably	did	n't	totally	satisfy	any	country	,	it	was	in	general	balanced	,	"	the	official	People	's	Daily	newspaper	said	in	a	commentary	.
"	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	RB	VBD	RB	RB	VB	DT	NN	,	PRP	VBD	IN	JJ	JJ	,	"	DT	JJ	NNS	POS	JJ	NN	VBD	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O
India	blocked	the	Comprehensive	Test	Ban	Treaty	(	CTBT	)	at	the	Conference	on	Disarmament	in	Geneva	,	saying	the	pact	did	not	contain	a	clause	committing	the	five	declared	nuclear	powers	to	a	timetable	for	nuclear	disarmament	.

The	government	said	on	Tuesday	that	the	threat	from	a	mysterious	killer	germ	,	while	still	requiring	vigilance	,	appears	to	be	receding	in	the	western	Japan	city	of	Sakai	,	where	the	epidemic	hit	the	hardest	.

Cooperative	Bank	of	Taiwan	,	one	of	the	island	's	leading	state-run	banks	,	said	it	was	cutting	its	prime	lending	rate	by	0.05	percentage	point	,	effective	on	Tuesday	.
NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	,	CD	IN	DT	NN	POS	VBG	JJ	NNS	,	VBD	PRP	VBD	VBG	PRP$	JJ	NN	NN	IN	CD	NN	NN	,	JJ	IN	NNP	.

In	the	central	bank	's	latest	bid	to	jumpstart	Taiwan	's	sluggish	economy	,	Sheu	ordered	a	reduction	of	up	to	a	half-percentage	point	in	banks	'	reserve	requirements	and	called	on	commercial	banks	to	pass	on	the	savings	in	the	form	of	interest	rate	reductions	.

Palestinian	leaders	in	Jerusalem	called	on	Tuesday	for	a	two-hour	strike	to	protest	what	they	called	Israel	's	war	on	Arab	East	Jerusalem	after	police	demolished	a	building	there	.
NN	NNS	IN	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NN	TO	VB	WP	PRP	VBD	NNP	POS	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NN	VBD	DT	NN	RB	.

Israeli	police	demolished	a	10	metre	(	yard	)	by	20	metre	structure	in	Jerusalem	's	Old	City	they	said	had	been	built	with	funding	from	the	Palestinian	self-rule	Authority	for	use	as	a	social	club	.

BRATISLAVA	1996-12-06
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Four	skinheads	attacked	and	insulted	the	rabbi	of	Bratislava	,	Baruch	Meyers	,	in	the	city	centre	on	Friday	,	but	he	escaped	unharmed	,	a	police	spokesman	told	Reuters	.
CD	NNS	VBN	CC	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NNP	,	NNP	NNP	,	IN	DT	NN	NN	IN	NNP	,	CC	PRP	VBD	JJ	,	DT	NN	NN	VBN	NNP	.

"	DT	NN	IN	CD	NNS	VBD	DT	NN	,	CD	VBD	PRP	IN	DT	NN	CC	VBD	DT	NN	,	"	DT	NN	VBD	.

O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
He	was	unable	to	give	more	details	.
PRP	VBD	JJ	TO	VB	JJR	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	The	further	procedure	is	now	in	the	hands	of	the	local	police	investigator	,	"	the	spokesman	said	.

TIRANA	1996-12-06
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
An	Albanian	court	on	Friday	sentenced	a	man	who	threatened	to	blow	himself	up	outside	President	Sali	Berisha	's	office	to	13	years	in	jail	for	guerrilla	action	and	illegal	possession	of	arms	.
DT	NN	NN	IN	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	WP	VBD	TO	VB	PRP	RP	RB	NNP	NNP	NNP	POS	NN	TO	CD	NNS	IN	NN	IN	NN	NN	CC	JJ	NN	IN	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Buza	last	April	said	he	would	blow	himself	up	outside	the	presidential	palace	unless	he	was	allowed	to	speak	to	Berisha	,	who	was	at	the	time	meeting	Italian	President	Oscar	Luigi	Scalfaro	.
NN	JJ	NNP	VBD	PRP	MD	VB	PRP	RP	RB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	PRP	VBD	VBN	TO	VB	TO	NNP	,	WP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	.

Canada	is	fast-tracking	immigration	applications	from	Chinese	dissidents	in	Hong	Kong	before	the	British	colony	reverts	to	China	's	control	next	year	,	the	Vancouver	Sun	reported	on	Wednesday	.

The	applications	are	being	"	fast-tracked	in	the	sense	that	we	are	processing	them	and	the	ones	who	have	been	referred	to	us	have	been	interviewed	,	"	the	newspaper	quoted	Garrett	Lambert	,	Canada	's	high	commissioner	in	Hong	Kong	,	as	saying	.

Iran	's	deputy	representative	to	the	United	Nations	,	Majid	Takht	Ravanchi	,	made	the	allegations	in	a	letter	to	U.N.	Secretary-General	Boutros	Boutros-Ghali	on	Friday	,	the	agency	said	.

"	The	Islamic	Republic	of	Iran	has	reported	some	32	new	cases	of	ceasefire	violations	by	the	Iraqi	regime	between	March	31	and	May	31	,	1996	,	"	it	reported	from	New	York	.
"	DT	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	VBZ	VBN	DT	CD	JJ	NNS	IN	NN	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	CD	CC	NNP	CD	,	CD	,	"	PRP	VBD	IN	NNP	NNP	.

It	said	violations	included	constructing	observation	posts	,	installing	mortars	and	anti-aircraft	cannons	,	setting	up	tents	,	penetrating	Iranian	territory	,	and	firing	rifle	grenades	towards	Iranian	territory	.

Defence	Minister	Volker	Ruehe	said	that	German	troops	would	stay	on	in	Bosnia	next	year	as	part	of	an	international	force	to	ensure	the	establishment	of	peace	,	a	newspaper	reported	on	Saturday	.

"	In	the	property	market	it	is	a	case	of	so	far	,	so	good	,	"	a	member	of	SBC	Warburg	's	property	team	said	.

SBC	Warburg	said	it	is	maintaining	its	forecast	for	five	percent	growth	in	rental	incomes	during	1996	,	but	it	has	shaved	its	forecast	for	capital	growth	to	five	percent	from	six	.

Canada	's	international	travel	account	gap	shrinks	.
NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NN	NN	VBZ	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
OTTAWA	1996-08-29
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Higher	spending	by	foreign	visitors	and	less	Canadian	tourist	spending	abroad	cut	the	deficit	in	Canada	's	international	travel	account	by	26.5	percent	in	the	second	quarter	,	Statistics	Canada	said	on	Thursday	.
JJR	NN	IN	JJ	NNS	CC	JJR	JJ	NN	NN	RB	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NN	IN	CD	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	,	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O
The	deficit	fell	to	a	seasonally	adjusted	C$	715	million	in	the	second	quarter	from	C$	973	million	in	the	first	,	as	foreigners	spent	a	record	C$	3.00	billion	seasonally	adjusted	while	Canadians	reduced	their	spending	abroad	by	5.1	percent	to	C$	3.72	billion	.

Iranian	security	forces	have	broken	up	five	espionage	rings	in	northwestern	Iran	and	arrested	41	people	on	charges	of	spying	for	unnamed	countries	,	a	daily	newspaper	said	on	Thursday	.
JJ	NN	NNS	VB	VBN	RP	CD	NN	NNS	IN	JJ	NNP	CC	VBN	CD	NNS	IN	NNS	IN	VBG	IN	JJ	NNS	,	DT	JJ	NN	VBD	IN	NNP	.

Jomhuri	Eslami	quoted	the	West	Azerbaijan	province	security	chief	as	saying	those	held	confessed	to	gathering	confidential	information	,	photographing	strategic	sites	,	doing	propaganda	against	state	officials	and	"	spreading	pan-Turkism	"	.

It	was	not	clear	if	they	were	the	same	five	spy	rings	,	allegedly	led	by	Turkish	diplomats	,	that	Iran	said	in	April	it	had	broken	up	in	the	same	area	,	which	borders	Turkey	.

The	April	arrests	were	announced	shortly	after	a	row	in	which	Tehran	asked	Ankara	to	withdraw	four	Turkish	diplomats	accused	of	spying	,	and	Turkey	expelled	four	Iranian	diplomats	for	their	alleged	links	to	killings	of	Iranian	exiles	.

A	two-year	old	Puerto	Rican	girl	began	surgical	treatment	on	Tuesday	for	a	rare	condition	that	has	left	half	of	her	face	covered	with	a	hairy	,	dark-brown	patch	of	skin	.

The	girl	,	Abyss	DeJesus	,	suffers	from	a	"	hairy	nevus	"	on	the	right	side	of	her	face	,	a	condition	that	has	only	been	reported	a	few	times	in	medical	journals	,	the	St.	Christopher	Children	's	Hospital	said	.

Massachusetts	home	sales	dip	in	July	-	report	.

Home	sales	across	Massachusetts	were	down	2.3	percent	in	July	,	compared	to	a	month	earlier	,	but	up	21	percent	for	the	year	,	according	to	the	Massachusetts	Association	of	Realtors	.
NNP	NNS	IN	NNP	VBD	RB	CD	NN	IN	NNP	,	VBN	TO	DT	NN	RB	,	CC	RB	CD	NN	IN	DT	NN	,	VBG	TO	DT	NNP	NNP	IN	NNPS	.

The	association	said	a	total	of	4,464	single-family	homes	were	sold	in	July	,	compared	to	4,570	in	June	.

The	average	selling	price	,	$	206,464	,	was	up	10.6	percent	over	July	1995	.

O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Condominium	sales	edged	up	6.0	percent	for	July	and	24.8	percent	for	the	year	,	the	group	said	,	while	prices	for	condos	nudged	up	less	than	1.0	percent	to	an	average	of	$	123,394	.

In	July	,	the	average	rate	on	a	30-year	fixed	rate	mortgage	was	8.25	percent	,	below	June	's	8.32	percent	but	still	higher	than	February	's	7.03	percent	,	the	report	noted	.

At	least	three	people	were	injured	when	an	Amtrak	passenger	train	slammed	into	an	empty	logging	truck	and	derailed	Tuesday	,	officials	said	.
IN	JJS	CD	NNS	VBD	VBN	WRB	DT	NNP	NN	NN	VBD	IN	DT	JJ	VBG	NN	CC	VBN	NNP	,	NNS	VBD	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	Vermonter	,	which	runs	between	St.	Albans	,	Vermont	,	near	the	Canadian	border	and	Washington	,	D.C.	,	collided	with	the	truck	at	7:51	a.m.	EDT	near	the	rural	town	of	Roxbury	some	15	miles	southeast	of	the	state	capital	Montpelier	,	Amtrak	spokeswoman	Maureen	Garrity	said	.

A	stake	of	10	million	shares	in	Russian	gas	monopoly	RAO	Gazprom	was	sold	at	auction	on	Thursday	at	an	average	2,901.48	roubles	a	share	,	up	from	2,891.00	roubles	a	week	ago	,	the	Federal	Securities	Corporation	(	FFK	)	said	.

Swedish	options	and	derivatives	exchange	OM	Gruppen	AB	said	on	Thursday	it	would	open	an	electronic	bourse	for	forest	industry	products	in	London	in	the	first	half	of	1997	.

Well	repairs	to	lift	Heidrun	oil	output	-	Statoil	.
RB	NNS	TO	VB	NNP	NN	NN	:	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	B-ORG	O
OSLO	1996-08-22
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Three	plugged	water	injection	wells	on	the	Heidrun	oilfield	off	mid-Norway	will	be	reopened	over	the	next	month	,	operator	Den	Norske	Stats	Oljeselskap	AS	(	Statoil	)	said	on	Thursday	.
CD	JJ	NN	NN	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	JJ	NN	VB	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	,	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	VBD	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O
The	plugged	wells	have	accounted	for	a	dip	of	30,000	barrels	per	day	(	bpd	)	in	Heidrun	output	to	roughly	220,000	bpd	,	according	to	the	company	's	Status	Weekly	newsletter	.
DT	VBD	NNS	VBP	VBN	IN	DT	NN	IN	CD	NNS	IN	NN	(	NN	)	IN	JJ	NN	TO	RB	CD	VBN	,	VBG	TO	DT	NN	POS	NNP	NNP	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O
The	wells	will	be	reperforated	and	gravel	will	be	pumped	into	the	reservoir	through	one	of	the	wells	to	avoid	plugging	problems	in	the	future	,	it	said	.

HELSINKI	1996-08-22

Finland	's	trade	surplus	rose	to	3.83	billion	markka	in	April	from	3.43	billion	in	March	,	the	National	Customs	Board	(	NCB	)	said	in	a	statement	on	Thursday	.
NN	POS	NN	NN	VBD	TO	CD	CD	NNS	IN	NNP	IN	CD	CD	IN	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	.

The	value	of	exports	fell	one	percent	year-on-year	in	April	and	the	value	of	imports	fell	two	percent	,	NCB	said	.

RUGBY	UNION	-	All	Blacks	relive	triumph	.

PRETORIA	,	Aug	25	-	Captain	Sean	Fitzpatrick	and	his	All	Blacks	revisited	the	test	venue	today	to	relive	some	of	the	magic	moments	of	yesterday	's	momentous	rugby	victory	over	South	Africa	,	NZPA	reported	.
NNP	,	NNP	CD	:	NNP	NNP	NNP	CC	PRP$	DT	NNPS	VBN	DT	NN	NN	NN	TO	VBP	DT	IN	DT	NN	NNS	IN	NN	POS	JJ	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	,	NNP	VBD	.

Most	of	the	test	15	who	beat	the	Springboks	33-26	to	secure	New	Zealand	's	first-ever	rugby	series	in	South	Africa	stood	in	the	middle	of	the	empty	50,000-seat	Loftus	Versfeld	.

Magnificent	,	'	'	said	Fitzpatrick	,	New	Zealand	's	most	capped	player	and	the	world	's	most	capped	forward	.

Sarah	Brady	--	The	nation	's	toughest	gun	control	law	is	named	after	Ronald	Reagan	's	press	secretary	James	Brady	but	it	was	his	wife	who	was	the	major	force	behind	its	passage	.

Brush	Wellman	Inc	said	Monday	that	10	of	24	lawsuits	involving	chronic	beryllium	disease	have	been	dismissed	since	July	1	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	IN	CD	IN	CD	NNS	VBG	JJ	NN	NN	VBP	VBN	VBN	IN	NNP	CD	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	leading	U.S.	beryllium	producer	said	in	a	conference	call	it	has	traditionally	been	pro-active	regarding	the	workplace	disease	,	a	lung	ailment	which	can	affects	a	small	percent	of	people	whose	immune	systems	are	susceptible	.

1996-08-27
CD
O
Penn	Treaty	American	Corp	said	Tuesday	it	terminated	a	previously	announced	non-binding	letter	of	intent	to	purchase	Merrion	Insurance	Company	Inc	,	a	New	York	licensed	company	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	PRP	VBD	DT	RB	VBN	JJ	NN	IN	NN	TO	VB	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NNP	VBD	NN	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O
In	announcing	its	decision	,	Penn	Treaty	said	it	"	will	continue	to	actively	pursue	entering	into	the	New	York	long-term	care	market	through	licensing	or	by	acquisition	.	"
IN	VBG	PRP$	NN	,	NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP	"	MD	VB	TO	RB	VB	VBG	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	JJ	NN	NN	IN	NN	CC	IN	NN	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
It	explained	the	"	addition	of	a	New	York	license	will	enable	Penn	Treaty	American	Corp	to	conduct	business	in	all	50	states	,	following	the	company	's	acquisition	of	Health	Insurance	of	Vermont	,	a	Vermont	domiciled	insurer	,	scheduled	to	close	on	August	30	,	1996	.	"
PRP	VBD	DT	"	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NN	MD	VB	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	TO	VB	NN	IN	DT	CD	NNS	,	VBG	DT	NN	POS	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	,	DT	NNP	VBD	NN	,	VBN	TO	VB	IN	NNP	CD	,	CD	.	"

In	Home	Health	Inc	said	on	Thursday	it	will	appeal	to	the	U.S.	Federal	District	Court	in	Minneapolis	a	decision	by	the	Health	Care	Financing	Administration	(	HCFA	)	that	denied	reimbursement	of	certain	costs	under	Medicaid	.

Women	who	get	measles	while	pregnant	may	have	babies	at	higher	risk	of	Crohn	's	disease	,	a	debilitating	bowel	disorder	,	researchers	said	on	Friday	.

Garlic	pills	do	n't	lower	cholesterol	,	study	finds	.

Garlic	pills	may	not	lower	blood	cholesterol	and	studies	that	show	they	do	may	be	flawed	,	British	researchers	have	reported	.
JJ	NNS	MD	RB	VB	NN	NN	CC	NNS	WDT	VBP	PRP	VBP	MD	VB	JJ	,	JJ	NNS	VBP	VBN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O
A	study	by	a	team	of	doctors	at	Oxford	University	has	found	people	with	high	blood	cholesterol	do	not	benefit	significantly	from	taking	garlic	tablets	.
DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNS	IN	NNP	NNP	VBZ	VBN	NNS	IN	JJ	NN	NN	VBP	RB	VB	RB	IN	VBG	NN	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	study	involved	115	people	with	high	blood	cholesterol	levels	.
DT	NN	VBN	CD	NNS	IN	JJ	NN	NN	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
They	were	given	900	milligrams	a	day	of	dried	garlic	powder	or	placebo	tablets	.	"
PRP	VBD	VBN	CD	NNS	DT	NN	IN	JJ	NN	NN	CC	NN	NNS	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
There	were	no	significant	differences	between	the	groups	receiving	garlic	and	placebo	,	"	they	wrote	in	the	Journal	of	the	Royal	College	of	Physicians	.
EX	VBD	DT	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NNS	VBG	NN	CC	NN	,	"	PRP	VBD	IN	DT	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	IN	NNPS	.

Those	taking	part	were	told	to	eat	a	low-fat	diet	for	six	weeks	before	they	started	taking	the	pills	,	and	their	blood	cholesterol	measured	before	and	after	the	six-week	period	.

The	researchers	said	this	would	make	their	findings	more	accurate	.

Several	studies	have	found	garlic	pills	can	lower	blood	pressure	and	blood	cholesterol	.
JJ	NNS	VBP	VBN	NN	NNS	MD	VB	NN	NN	CC	NN	NN	.

Colombia	's	peso	closed	lower	at	1,044	after	coming	under	pressure	from	dollar-buying	by	importers	seeking	to	meet	their	commitments	abroad	,	interbank	dealers	said	.

It	was	the	second	consecutive	session	that	saw	the	peso	,	which	ended	at	1,041	Friday	,	close	lower	.

"	The	(	dollar	's	)	rise	was	due	to	demand	from	importers	who	have	a	lot	of	wire	transfers	accumulated	,	"	one	dealer	said	.

SEC	adopts	rules	to	improve	investor	access	to	best	stock	prices	.

B-LOC	O
The	Securities	and	Exchange	Commission	Wednesday	approved	rules	designed	to	give	stock	market	investors	a	better	chance	at	getting	the	best	price	available	for	their	orders	.
DT	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	NNS	VBN	TO	VB	NN	NN	NNS	DT	JJR	NN	IN	VBG	DT	JJS	NN	JJ	IN	PRP$	NNS	.
O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	so-called	order	handling	rules	,	which	were	proposed	last	September	,	were	approved	in	a	4-0	vote	.
DT	JJ	NN	VBG	NNS	,	WDT	VBD	VBN	JJ	NNP	,	VBD	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	new	rules	will	require	specialists	at	stock	exchanges	and	market	makers	on	Nasdaq	to	allow	customers	to	view	price	quotes	from	other	electronic	trading	systems	that	may	not	be	readily	available	to	them	.
DT	JJ	NNS	MD	VB	NNS	IN	NN	NNS	CC	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	TO	VB	NNS	TO	VB	NN	NNS	IN	JJ	JJ	NN	NNS	WDT	MD	RB	VB	RB	JJ	TO	PRP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	rules	will	also	require	that	customer	limit	orders	be	displayed	with	prices	better	than	those	available	in	quotes	publicly	available	at	the	time	.
DT	NNS	MD	RB	VB	DT	NN	NN	NNS	VB	VBN	IN	NNS	JJR	IN	DT	JJ	IN	NNS	RB	JJ	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Specialists	and	market	makers	are	companies	or	individuals	recognised	as	qualified	to	maintain	an	orderly	market	in	a	stock	.
NNS	CC	NN	NNS	VBP	NNS	CC	NNS	VBD	IN	VBN	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
In	a	limit	order	,	investors	specify	the	price	at	which	they	are	willing	to	buy	or	sell	,	as	opposed	to	a	market	order	executed	at	prevailing	prices	.
IN	DT	NN	NN	,	NNS	VBP	DT	NN	IN	WDT	PRP	VBP	JJ	TO	VB	CC	VB	,	IN	VBN	TO	DT	NN	NN	VBN	IN	VBG	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	These	rules	are	intended	to	empower	all	investors	,	by	allowing	their	orders	to	compete	on	a	level	playing	field	,	and	by	providing	the	disclosure	they	need	to	make	informed	decisions	,	"	said	SEC	Chairman	Arthur	Levitt	.

The	SEC	's	goal	,	he	added	,	was	to	create	"	one	system	where	one	price	could	be	available	to	everybody	.	"

The	director	of	the	SEC	's	division	of	market	regulation	,	Richard	Lindsey	,	said	Wall	Street	firms	will	probably	need	to	spend	about	$	7	million	to	carry	out	the	improvements	called	for	by	the	new	rules	.

In	proposing	the	rules	last	year	,	the	SEC	noted	that	while	technology	has	improved	,	commonplace	practices	still	existed	that	worked	against	investors	'	best	interests	.

It	noted	that	customers	whose	orders	were	not	displayed	lost	the	chance	of	getting	the	best	possible	price	available	in	the	market	.

It	also	cited	the	potential	problem	of	a	two-tiered	market	in	which	market	makers	quote	one	price	to	public	investors	while	quoting	better	prices	in	private	systems	,	thus	robbing	investors	without	access	to	"	hidden	"	quotes	the	benefit	of	the	best	available	prices	.

The	SEC	dropped	a	third	proposal	that	would	have	allowed	investors	with	market	orders	to	trade	at	a	better	price	if	there	were	shifts	in	prices	before	their	orders	were	executed	.

A	passenger	train	collided	with	a	locomotive	at	a	main	railway	station	in	Linz	on	Wednesday	and	police	said	around	10	people	were	injured	.

Thousands	of	farmers	threw	up	roadblocks	across	France	overnight	,	stopping	and	checking	lorries	suspected	of	importing	meat	from	outside	the	European	Union	,	French	radios	reported	on	Thursday	.
NNS	IN	NNS	VBD	RB	NNS	IN	NNP	JJ	,	VBG	CC	NN	NNS	VBD	IN	VBG	NN	IN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	,	JJ	NNS	VBN	IN	NNP	.
