Radio	stations	said	around	15,000	farmers	,	angered	by	a	fall	in	beef	prices	following	the	mad	cow	disease	crisis	,	staged	protests	in	many	areas	and	blockaded	several	main	roads	and	motorways	.

CRICKET	-	CROFT	RESTRICTS	PAKISTAN	TO	225-5	.
NNP	:	NNP	NNP	NNP	TO	CD	.
O	O	B-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	O
MANCHESTER	,	England	1996-08-29
NNP	,	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
Tight	bowling	from	Glamorgan	off-spinner	Robert	Croft	helped	England	to	restrict	Pakistan	to	225	for	five	in	their	50	overs	in	the	first	one-day	international	at	Old	Trafford	on	Thursday	.
NN	NN	IN	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	TO	VB	NNP	TO	CD	IN	CD	IN	PRP$	CD	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	JJ	IN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	B-ORG	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O
Croft	,	who	was	one	of	the	few	Englishmen	to	make	a	good	impression	in	his	test	debut	at	The	Oval	last	week	,	showed	great	control	as	he	first	dried	up	the	early	flow	of	Pakistan	runs	and	then	collected	the	wickets	of	Aamir	Sohail	and	Wasim	Akram	in	a	spell	of	10-1-36-2	.
NN	,	WP	VBD	CD	IN	DT	JJ	NNP	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	,	VBD	JJ	NN	IN	PRP	RB	VBD	RP	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	VBZ	CC	RB	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	NN	IN	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O
There	was	also	a	wicket	each	for	Ronnie	Irani	,	Allan	Mullally	and	Darren	Gough	although	there	was	no	joy	for	Dean	Headley	who	,	along	with	Lancashire	batsman	Graham	Lloyd	,	was	making	his	international	debut	.
EX	VBD	RB	DT	NN	DT	IN	NNP	NNP	,	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	IN	EX	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	WP	,	IN	IN	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	,	VBD	VBG	PRP$	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
After	Wasim	had	won	the	toss	and	chosen	to	bat	first	,	Pakistani	made	an	excellent	start	as	Sohail	and	Saeed	Anwar	continued	their	good	form	with	an	opening	partnership	of	82	.
IN	NNP	VBD	VBN	DT	VB	CC	VBN	TO	VB	RB	,	JJ	VBN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	NN	IN	CD	.
O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Anwar	,	who	struck	a	superb	176	at	The	Oval	,	was	the	more	aggressive	as	he	made	57	from	75	balls	before	skying	a	catch	off	Irani	to	Mullally	at	long-on	.
NNP	,	WP	VBD	DT	JJ	CD	IN	DT	JJ	,	VBD	DT	RBR	JJ	IN	PRP	VBD	CD	IN	CD	NNS	IN	VBG	DT	NN	IN	NNP	TO	NNP	IN	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	B-PER	O	O	O
Sohail	and	Ijaz	Ahmed	then	added	59	for	the	second	wicket	before	England	struck	back	with	three	wickets	for	19	in	the	space	of	five	overs	.
NN	CC	NNP	NNP	RB	VBD	CD	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	VBD	RP	IN	CD	NNS	IN	CD	IN	DT	NN	IN	CD	NNS	.

First	,	Sohail	,	after	making	48	,	was	bowled	by	Croft	as	he	stepped	back	to	try	and	hit	through	the	off-side	.
RB	,	NNP	,	IN	VBG	CD	,	VBD	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	PRP	VBD	RB	TO	VB	CC	VBD	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O

Second	seed	and	co-world	number	one	Monica	Seles	advanced	to	the	third	round	of	the	U.S.	Open	Tennis	Championships	without	hitting	a	ball	on	Wednesday	.
JJ	NN	CC	JJ	NN	CD	NNP	NNP	VBD	TO	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNPS	IN	VBG	DT	NN	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	I-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Seles	,	the	1991	and	1992	champion	who	dropped	just	one	game	in	her	opening	match	,	was	scheduled	to	play	Laurence	Courtois	of	Belgium	Wednesay	night	.
NNS	,	DT	CD	CC	CD	NN	WP	VBD	RB	CD	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	NN	,	VBD	VBN	TO	VB	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	O
But	tournament	officials	announced	about	four-and-a-half	hours	before	the	match	that	Courtois	had	pulled	out	due	to	a	left	knee	bone	inflammation	,	moving	Seles	into	the	next	round	on	a	walkover	.

Outspoken	Andrei	Medvedev	exchanged	his	reputation	as	the	clown	prince	of	tennis	on	Wednesday	for	a	new	no-nonsense	attitude	that	has	made	life	on	the	courts	fun	again	.

TOKYO	1996-08-28
TO	CD
B-LOC	O
Japan	's	Finance	Minister	Wataru	Kubo	told	a	news	conference	on	Wednesday	that	he	believes	that	the	Bank	of	Japan	's	(	BOJ	)	interest	rate	policy	which	is	geared	towards	ensuring	economic	growth	has	not	changed	after	the	release	of	the	central	bank	's	"	tankan	"	survey	.
NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	NN	IN	NNP	IN	PRP	VBZ	IN	DT	NNP	IN	NNP	POS	(	NNP	)	NN	NN	NN	WDT	VBZ	VBN	IN	VBG	JJ	NN	VBZ	RB	VBN	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	POS	"	VBG	"	NN	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	BOJ	released	the	August	tankan	,	its	quarterly	short-term	corporate	survey	,	in	the	morning	and	it	showed	business	outlook	had	worsened	.

TOKYO	1996-08-28
TO	CD
B-LOC	O
The	leader	of	a	junior	partner	in	Japan	's	three-party	ruling	coalition	plans	to	resign	to	quell	a	political	rebellion	,	party	officials	said	on	Wednesday	.
DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NN	NNS	TO	VB	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	,	NN	NNS	VBD	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	officials	said	New	Party	Sakigake	President	Masayoshi	Takemura	,	finance	minister	until	the	beginning	of	this	year	,	promised	his	resignation	in	a	meeting	with	the	politician	who	set	off	the	rebellion	in	the	smallest	coalition	member	.

The	Sakigake	row	has	caused	jitters	in	its	coalition	partners	,	Prime	Minister	Ryutaro	Hashimoto	's	Liberal	Democratic	Party	(	LDP	)	,	the	biggest	grouping	,	and	the	Social	Democratic	Party	.

The	dispute	pits	Takemura	,	who	founded	Sakigake	in	1993	as	a	reform-oriented	LDP	splinter	group	,	against	party	official	Yukio	Hatoyama	,	who	says	he	will	leave	Sakigake	to	form	a	reformist	political	group	next	month	.

Hatoyama	,	the	49-year-old	grandson	of	a	1950s	prime	minister	,	on	Tuesday	quit	as	Sakigake	secretary	general	and	has	publicly	snubbed	the	62-year-old	Takemura	,	pointedly	ruling	his	mentor	out	as	a	possible	member	of	the	new	political	force	.

Marathon	talks	between	the	two	former	allies	on	Tuesday	night	and	Wednesday	morning	failed	to	resolve	the	dispute	over	the	role	of	Takemura	,	seen	by	Hatoyama	backers	as	tainted	by	his	senior	role	in	the	LDP-dominated	coalition	.

Japan	's	refined	zinc	imports	in	July	totalled	3,684	tonnes	,	off	47.5	percent	from	7,011	tonnes	in	the	same	month	a	year	earlier	,	according	to	Ministry	of	Finance	data	released	on	Wednesday	.

Argentine	raw	steel	output	was	355,900	tonnes	in	July	,	14.8	percent	higher	than	in	July	1995	and	up	1.9	percent	from	June	,	Steel	Industry	Center	said	Thursday	.

British	hostage	in	Chechnya	describes	ordeal	.
JJ	NN	IN	NNP	VBZ	RB	.
B-MISC	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O
LONDON	1996-08-24
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
A	British	aid	worker	,	held	hostage	in	Chechnya	for	nearly	four	weeks	,	said	on	Saturday	a	cocked	Kalashnikov	had	been	thrust	into	his	mouth	at	one	point	during	his	ordeal	.
DT	NNP	NN	NN	,	VBN	NN	IN	NNP	IN	RB	CD	NNS	,	VBD	IN	NNP	DT	VBD	NNP	VBD	VBN	VBN	IN	PRP$	NN	IN	CD	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	.
O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Michael	Penrose	,	a	23-year-old	worker	with	the	group	Action	Against	Hunger	,	described	his	ordeal	to	a	news	conference	when	he	arrived	back	in	Britain	from	Moscow	.
NNP	NNP	,	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	NNP	IN	NNP	,	VBD	PRP$	NN	TO	DT	NN	NN	WRB	PRP	VBD	RB	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
"	The	worst	period	of	physical	manhandling	was	during	that	time	when	we	were	beaten	with	Kalashnikovs	and	at	one	point	I	had	a	Kalashnikov	held	to	the	back	of	my	throat	--	cocked	,	"	he	said	.
"	DT	JJS	NN	IN	JJ	NN	VBD	IN	DT	NN	WRB	PRP	VBD	VBN	IN	NNPS	CC	IN	CD	NN	PRP	VBD	DT	NNP	VBD	TO	DT	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	:	VBN	,	"	PRP	VBD	.

"	For	the	first	period	we	were	held	in	a	small	room	with	no	bed	or	anything	.
"	IN	DT	JJ	NN	PRP	VBD	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	CC	NN	.

Gunmen	seized	Penrose	,	who	comes	from	Swerford	in	southern	England	,	Frenchman	Frederic	Malardeau	and	six	other	hostages	from	their	car	in	Grozny	,	the	capital	of	Chechnya	,	on	July	27	.

The	assailants	had	demanded	a	ransom	of	300,000	pounds	(	$	465,000	)	but	no	money	was	paid	by	the	charity	when	they	were	released	on	Wednesday	.

The	hostages	were	held	in	a	house	in	or	near	Grozny	which	was	bombarded	regularly	.

"	During	the	last	15	days	of	being	held	,	the	fighting	in	Grozny	was	very	close	.
"	IN	DT	JJ	CD	NNS	IN	VBG	VBN	,	DT	NN	IN	NNP	VBD	RB	JJ	.

At	first	it	was	street	fighting	outside	the	house	and	then	we	came	under	very	heavy	shelling	and	bombardment	from	conventional	weapons	like	tanks	,	artillery	and	grenade	launchers	,	"	he	said	.

Penrose	had	been	working	for	the	charity	which	provides	food	to	civilians	for	only	a	few	weeks	before	he	was	captured	.

Adventurers	start	Canadian	wilderness	race	.
NNS	VBP	JJ	NN	NN	.

PEMBERTON	,	British	Columbia	1996-08-24
NNP	,	NNP	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O
About	350	adventurers	from	nine	countries	set	out	on	Saturday	to	climb	,	raft	,	bike	and	run	in	a	323-mile	(	517-km	)	endurance	race	through	the	Canadian	wilderness	.
IN	CD	NNS	IN	CD	NNS	VBN	RP	IN	NNP	TO	VB	,	NN	,	NN	CC	VB	IN	DT	JJ	(	CD	)	NN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O
The	event	,	called	the	Eco-Challenge	,	is	part	of	a	growing	sport	known	as	adventure	racing	in	which	competitors	test	their	limits	for	days	over	a	perilous	wilderness	course	.

"	PRP	VBP	VBG	RB	TO	DT	NN	.

I	think	it	will	be	more	physically	challenging	and	we	'll	have	to	go	up	against	more	diverse	situations	due	to	the	terrain	,	"	said	Dr.	Michael	Stroud	,	a	veteran	Eco-Challenge	participant	.
PRP	VBP	PRP	MD	VB	RBR	RB	JJ	CC	PRP	MD	VB	TO	VB	RP	IN	RBR	JJ	NNS	JJ	TO	DT	NN	,	"	VBD	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	.

Nippon	Telegraph	and	Telephone	Corp	(	NTT	)	said	on	Friday	that	it	hopes	to	move	into	the	international	telecommunications	business	as	soon	as	possible	following	the	government	's	decision	to	split	NTT	into	three	firms	under	a	holding	company	.
NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	VBD	IN	NNP	IN	PRP	VBZ	TO	VB	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	NN	RB	RB	IN	JJ	NN	DT	NN	POS	NN	TO	VB	NNP	IN	CD	NNS	IN	DT	VBG	NN	.

"	We	hope	to	start	international	telephone	business	as	soon	as	possible	,	"	a	company	official	told	Reuters	.
"	PRP	VBP	TO	VB	JJ	NN	NN	RB	RB	IN	JJ	,	"	DT	NN	NN	VBN	NNP	.

The	official	said	the	latest	government	decision	to	split	the	company	under	a	holding	company	would	allow	flexibility	in	NTT	's	international	phone	business	.

O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O
Earlier	,	Posts	and	Telecommunications	Minister	Hisao	Horinouchi	told	a	news	conference	the	government	plans	to	split	NTT	into	three	firms	under	a	holding	company	,	but	did	not	specify	when	the	restructuring	would	likely	take	effect	.

One	of	the	three	new	companies	will	be	a	long-distance	operator	and	the	other	two	will	be	local-call	operators	,	Horinouchi	said	.

The	NTT	official	said	the	timing	of	the	planned	split-up	was	uncertain	because	more	discussions	by	government	officials	were	required	.

Ahold	launches	Asian	food	discount	stores	.
NNP	VBZ	JJ	NN	NN	NNS	.

ZAANDAM	,	Netherlands	1996-12-06
NNP	,	NNP	CD

Dutch	supermarkets	group	Ahold	NV	said	on	Friday	it	had	launched	a	second	food	store	format	for	Asian	consumers	today	,	opening	16	BILO	food	discount	stores	in	Malaysia	.
JJ	NNS	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	PRP	VBD	VBN	DT	JJ	NN	NN	NN	IN	JJ	NNS	NN	,	VBG	CD	NNP	NN	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	.

The	BILO	stores	are	located	in	Malysia	's	capital	Kuala	Lumpur	and	in	the	country	's	second	city	Johor	Bahru	.
DT	NNP	NNS	VBP	VBN	IN	NNP	POS	NN	NNP	NNP	CC	IN	DT	NN	POS	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	.

The	discount	price	format	store	BILO	is	to	complement	Ahold	's	full	service	supermarket	TOPS	,	recently	launched	in	Asia	.

Gold	miner	Newcrest	Mining	Ltd	said	on	Wednesday	it	posted	a	A$	4.3	million	profit	after	tax	in	the	final	quarter	of	the	year	to	June	30	,	1996	.

Earlier	,	Newcrest	reported	a	drop	in	net	profit	after	abnormals	to	A$	20.81	million	for	the	year	from	A$	42.4	million	the	previous	year	.

BRISBANE	1996-08-28
NN	CD
B-ORG	O
Australian	police	on	Wednesday	continued	to	hunt	a	gunman	in	dense	bushland	after	he	killed	his	wife	and	wounded	three	other	people	,	warning	the	man	is	extremely	dangerous	and	may	take	a	hostage	to	escape	.

SHANGHAI	1996-08-28
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Shanghai-Ek	Chor	Motorcycle	Co	,	a	Sino-Thai	joint	venture	,	opened	a	new	plant	to	produce	gasoline	engines	in	the	Pudong	New	Area	of	Shanghai	,	the	Xinhua	news	agency	reported	on	Wednesday	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	DT	NNP	JJ	NN	,	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	TO	VB	NN	NNS	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NN	NN	VBD	IN	NNP	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	I-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	plant	,	requiring	an	investment	of	three	billion	baht	,	has	a	floor	space	of	50,000	square	metres	and	is	designed	to	produce	600,000	gasoline	engines	a	year	,	to	be	sold	in	China	,	South	America	,	the	Middle	East	and	Africa	,	it	said	.

Capacity	is	expected	to	reach	one	million	engines	by	the	year	2000	,	it	said	.

NNP	,	NNP	CD
O	O	B-LOC	O
Dissident	Khmer	Rouge	leader	Ieng	Sary	confirmed	on	Wednesday	that	he	had	broken	with	Pol	Pot	and	other	hardliners	of	the	guerrilla	group	and	had	formed	a	rival	movement	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	IN	PRP	VBD	VBN	IN	NNP	NNP	CC	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	CC	VBD	VBN	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Ieng	Sary	said	in	a	written	statement	,	the	first	since	his	split	with	Pol	Pot	earlier	this	month	,	that	the	new	movement	to	be	called	the	Democratic	National	United	Movement	(	DNUM	)	would	seek	an	end	to	civil	war	and	work	towards	reconciliation	with	the	Cambodian	government	.

Ieng	Sary	was	sentenced	to	death	in	absentia	for	his	role	in	the	mass	genocide	in	Cambodia	during	the	Khmer	Rouge	rule	of	terror	between	1975-1979	when	over	a	million	people	were	executed	or	died	of	starvation	,	disease	or	overwork	in	mass	labour	camps	.

Two	people	were	killed	and	six	were	injured	after	a	helicopter	crashed	in	bad	weather	in	northern	Cambodia	,	a	government	minister	said	on	Wednesday	.

Germany	's	Agriculture	Ministry	suggested	on	Wednesday	that	consumers	avoid	eating	meat	from	British	sheep	until	scientists	determine	whether	mad	cow	disease	can	be	transmitted	to	the	animals	.

HOUSTON	1996-12-05
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Leaders	of	the	major	parties	involved	,	from	right-wing	whites	to	radical	blacks	,	appeared	before	Archbishop	Desmond	Tutu	's	Truth	and	Reconciliation	Commission	last	week	to	paint	the	broad	picture	of	their	actions	for	or	against	apartheid	.
NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	VBN	,	IN	NN	NNS	TO	JJ	NNS	,	VBD	IN	NNP	NNP	NNP	POS	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	JJ	NN	TO	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	PRP$	NNS	IN	CC	IN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Most	,	including	former	president	F.W.	de	Klerk	and	African	National	Congress	Deputy	President	Thabo	Mbeki	,	offered	apologies	for	any	mistakes	they	had	made	and	accepted	broad	responsibility	for	the	actions	of	their	foot	soldiers	.
JJS	,	VBG	JJ	NN	NNP	FW	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	VBN	NNS	IN	DT	NNS	PRP	VBD	VBN	CC	VBD	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NNS	IN	PRP$	NN	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	I-PER	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
But	none	named	those	guilty	of	ordering	or	carrying	out	any	of	the	gross	violations	of	human	rights	which	Tutu	is	investigating	.
CC	NN	VBD	DT	NN	IN	VBG	CC	VBG	RP	DT	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	IN	JJ	NNS	WDT	NNP	VBZ	VBG	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O
Human	rights	lawyer	Brian	Currin	said	the	hearings	last	week	were	not	intended	as	a	form	of	confessional	and	that	those	who	personally	committed	crimes	during	apartheid	would	testify	only	before	a	separate	arm	of	the	commission	,	the	amnesty	committee	.
JJ	NNS	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	NNS	JJ	NN	VBD	RB	VBN	IN	DT	NN	IN	JJ	CC	IN	DT	WP	RB	VBD	NNS	IN	NN	MD	VB	RB	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	,	DT	NN	NN	.
O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	I	do	n't	think	one	should	have	expected	more	than	what	one	got	,	"	he	said	.	"
"	PRP	VBP	RB	VB	CD	MD	VB	VBN	JJR	IN	WP	CD	NN	,	"	PRP	VBD	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
That	was	not	the	amnesty	committee	where	perpetrators	are	expected	to	open	their	hearts	and	souls	and	to	tell	it	all	.	"
DT	VBD	RB	DT	NN	NN	WRB	NNS	VBP	VBN	TO	VB	PRP$	NNS	CC	NNS	CC	TO	VB	PRP	DT	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	commission	,	which	has	the	power	to	grant	amnesty	to	those	who	confess	to	abuses	,	has	begun	hearing	the	testimony	from	people	already	in	jail	for	their	deeds	.
DT	NN	,	WDT	VBZ	DT	NN	TO	VB	NN	TO	DT	WP	VBP	TO	NNS	,	VBZ	VBN	VBG	DT	NN	IN	NNS	RB	IN	NN	IN	PRP$	NNS	.

But	others	,	such	as	self-confessed	secret	police	hit-squad	leader	Dirk	Coetzee	,	have	yet	to	testify	.
CC	NNS	,	JJ	IN	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	,	VBP	RB	TO	VB	.

Tutu	's	deputy	chairman	,	Alex	Boraine	,	told	reporters	the	commission	would	begin	issuing	subpoenas	to	suspects	who	refused	to	appear	voluntarily	some	time	this	week	.
NNP	POS	JJ	NN	,	NNP	NNP	,	VBD	NNS	DT	NN	MD	VB	VBG	NNS	TO	VBZ	WP	VBD	TO	VB	RB	DT	NN	DT	NN	.

He	added	that	former	hardline	apartheid	president	P.W.	Botha	could	be	among	those	called	.

But	Currin	,	who	is	advising	several	people	regarded	as	perpetrators	,	said	this	was	not	the	best	way	to	achieve	the	commission	's	aims	.
CC	NNP	,	WP	VBZ	VBG	JJ	NNS	VBN	IN	NNS	,	VBD	DT	VBD	RB	DT	JJS	NN	TO	VB	DT	NN	POS	VBZ	.
O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	A	person	can	be	forced	to	appear	,	but	the	only	way	one	is	going	to	get	to	the	truth	in	its	totality	is	if	people	feel	it	is	a	good	idea	to	go	to	the	amnesty	committee	.

He	cited	Coetzee	,	who	was	charged	with	murder	after	confessing	in	media	interviews	to	dirty	tricks	.
PRP	VBD	NNP	,	WP	VBD	VBN	IN	NN	IN	VBG	IN	NNS	NNS	TO	JJ	NNS	.
O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
His	trial	is	due	to	start	in	December	but	the	truth	commission	intends	to	decide	on	his	amnesty	application	before	that	.
PRP$	NN	VBZ	JJ	TO	VB	IN	NNP	CC	DT	NN	NN	VBZ	TO	VB	IN	PRP$	NN	NN	IN	DT	.

Researchers	report	progress	in	muscular	dystrophy	.
NNS	VB	NN	IN	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O
PHILADELPHIA	1996-08-29
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
University	of	Pennsylvania	researchers	on	Thursday	said	a	new	gene-therapy	technique	for	treating	muscular	dystrophy	disease	had	shown	progress	in	laboratory	animals	.
NNP	IN	NNP	NNS	IN	NNP	VBD	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	JJ	NN	NN	VBD	VBN	NN	IN	NN	NNS	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Word	of	the	findings	,	to	be	published	in	the	Oct.	1	issue	of	the	journal	"	Human	Gene	Therapy	,	"	came	in	advance	of	the	annual	Jerry	Lewis	Labour	Day	weekend	telethon	to	raise	money	for	muscular	dystrophy	research	.
NN	IN	DT	NNS	,	TO	VB	VBN	IN	DT	NNP	CD	NN	IN	DT	NN	"	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	"	VBD	IN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	NN	NN	TO	VB	NN	IN	JJ	NN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	I-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Several	hurdles	must	be	overcome	before	the	method	is	used	in	human	trials	.
JJ	NNS	MD	VB	VBN	IN	DT	NN	VBZ	VBN	IN	JJ	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Nevertheless	,	"	a	treatment	based	on	the	new	strategy	....	may	have	the	potential	to	benefit	many	patients	,	"	the	University	of	Pennsylvania	Medical	Centre	said	in	a	release	.
RB	,	"	DT	NN	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	NN	MD	VB	DT	JJ	TO	VB	JJ	NNS	,	"	DT	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Muscular	dystrophy	is	a	fatal	illness	in	which	the	body	's	muscle	tissue	degenerates	and	is	replaced	by	fat	.
JJ	NN	VBZ	DT	JJ	NN	IN	WDT	DT	NN	POS	NN	NN	VBZ	CC	VBZ	VBN	IN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Death	strikes	in	early	adulthood	.
NN	NNS	IN	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O
Individuals	with	the	disease	have	a	non-working	version	of	a	gene	responsible	for	producing	a	crucial	muscle	protein	called	dystrophin	.
NNS	IN	DT	NN	VB	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	JJ	IN	VBG	DT	JJ	NN	NN	VBD	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
In	the	study	at	the	University	's	Institute	for	Human	Gene	Therapy	,	researchers	altered	a	common-cold	virus	to	carry	a	version	of	the	working	dystrophin	gene	.
IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNP	POS	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	NNS	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	TO	VB	DT	NN	IN	DT	VBG	NN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	virus	,	which	also	was	altered	to	minimise	its	susceptibility	to	the	immune	system	,	was	then	injected	into	the	muscle	cells	of	mice	bred	to	lack	dystrophin	genes	.
DT	NN	,	WDT	RB	VBD	VBN	TO	VB	PRP$	NN	TO	DT	JJ	NN	,	VBD	RB	VBN	IN	DT	NN	NNS	IN	NNS	VBD	TO	VB	NN	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
In	the	experiment	,	between	30	to	40	percent	of	the	muscle	fibers	in	one	group	of	mice	produced	dystrophin	for	two	weeks	before	diminishing	.
IN	DT	NN	,	IN	CD	TO	CD	NN	IN	DT	NN	NNS	IN	CD	NN	IN	NNS	VBD	NN	IN	CD	NNS	IN	VBG	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Similar	results	had	been	obtained	previously	in	test-tube	cell	cultures	,	but	not	in	live	animals	,	the	university	said	.
JJ	NNS	VBD	VBN	VBN	RB	IN	NN	NN	NNS	,	CC	RB	IN	JJ	NNS	,	DT	NN	VBD	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	university	said	methods	are	still	needed	to	make	enough	of	the	altered	virus	to	treat	humans	,	to	further	decrease	the	immune-system	response	to	the	virus	,	and	to	deliver	the	virus	to	human	muscle	tissue	.

The	help-wanted	advertising	index	fell	in	July	,	the	Conference	Board	said	Thursday	,	reflecting	the	uneven	nature	of	the	nation	's	labour	markets	.

NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	NNP	TO	DT	NN	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	JJ	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	.

CRICKET	-	WOOLMER	MAKES	SENTIMENTAL	RETURN	TO	KANPUR	.
NNP	:	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	TO	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O
KANPUR	,	India	1996-12-07
NNP	,	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
South	Africa	's	trip	to	Kanpur	for	the	third	test	against	India	has	given	former	England	test	cricketer	Bob	Woolmer	the	chance	of	a	sentimental	return	to	his	birthplace	.
NNP	NNP	POS	NN	TO	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	VBZ	VBN	JJ	NNP	NN	NN	NNP	NNP	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	TO	PRP$	NN	.
B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Woolmer	was	born	in	the	northern	city	of	Kanpur	when	his	father	worked	there	for	an	insurance	compnay	and	was	himself	an	active	cricketer	.
NN	VBD	VBN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	WRB	PRP$	NN	VBD	RB	IN	DT	NN	JJ	CC	VBD	PRP	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	It	's	been	a	sentimental	journey	...
"	PRP	VBZ	VBN	DT	JJ	NN	:
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
A	visit	to	India	is	always	an	intriguing	experience	,	"	Woolmer	,	now	the	South	African	coach	,	said	on	Saturday	.
DT	NN	TO	NNP	VBZ	RB	DT	JJ	NN	,	"	NNP	,	RB	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	,	VBD	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O

PRP$	JJ	VBG	NN	TO	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	POS	NNP	NN	IN	CD	.

As	many	as	1	million	dog	bites	are	recorded	in	the	United	States	every	year	and	half	of	them	are	provoked	by	humans	,	a	veterinarian	told	fellow	animal	doctors	on	Friday	.
RB	JJ	IN	CD	CD	NN	NNS	VBP	VBN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	DT	NN	CC	NN	IN	PRP	VBP	VBN	IN	NNS	,	DT	NN	VBD	JJ	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	Humane	Society	of	the	United	States	estimates	that	between	500,000	and	one	million	bites	are	delivered	by	dogs	each	year	,	more	than	half	of	which	are	suffered	by	children	.
DT	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	VBZ	IN	IN	CD	CC	CD	CD	NNS	VBP	VBN	IN	NNS	DT	NN	,	JJR	IN	NN	IN	WDT	VBP	VBN	IN	NNS	.

"	Most	bites	can	be	prevented	by	teaching	children	how	to	respect	a	dog	,	"	Michael	Cornwell	of	the	Glencoe	Animal	Hospital	in	Columbus	,	Ohio	,	told	the	annual	meeting	of	the	American	Veterinary	Medical	Association	.

"	Let	's	not	let	our	kids	jump	on	them	or	crawl	on	them	.

Cornwell	said	50	percent	of	reported	bites	were	provoked	by	a	person	and	60	percent	were	suffered	by	children	.

He	also	estimated	that	only	25	percent	of	bites	were	reported	because	medical	attention	was	not	needed	.

Don	Rieck	,	president	of	the	National	Animal	Control	Association	,	said	aggressiveness	in	dogs	was	related	more	to	gender	than	breed	and	a	male	dog	that	had	not	been	neutered	was	three	times	more	likely	to	bite	than	an	unspayed	female	.

Four	African	states	are	ready	to	nominate	candidates	for	the	post	of	U.N.	secretary-general	on	Friday	now	that	Boutros	Boutros-Ghali	has	temporarily	put	aside	his	bid	for	re-election	.
CD	JJ	NNS	VBP	JJ	TO	VB	NNS	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	NN	IN	NNP	RB	IN	NNP	NNP	VBZ	RB	VB	RB	PRP$	NN	IN	NN	.
O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	nominees	,	according	to	diplomats	,	are	:	Kofi	Annan	of	Ghana	,	the	U.N.	undersecretary-general	for	peacekeeping	;	Ahmedou	Ould	Abdallah	of	Mauritania	,	the	former	U.N.	special	envoy	for	Burundi	;	Amara	Essy	of	the	Ivory	Coast	,	its	foreign	minister	and	the	U.N.	General	Assembly	president	in	1994-95	;	and	Hamid	Algabid	of	Niger	,	the	secretary-general	of	the	Organisation	of	the	Islamic	Conference	.

Representatives	of	the	U.N.	missions	of	Ghana	,	the	Ivory	Coast	,	Mauritania	and	Niger	have	scheduled	a	meeting	with	Security	Council	president	Paolo	Fulci	of	Italy	to	hand	in	the	nominations	in	writing	,	the	envoys	said	.

It	was	not	known	if	other	candidates	would	step	forward	.

Diplomats	said	General	Joseph	Garba	of	Nigeria	,	a	U.N.	General	Assembly	president	in	1989-90	,	was	putting	forth	his	own	candidacy	without	being	nominated	by	his	country	.
NNS	VBD	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	,	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	NN	IN	CD	,	VBD	VBG	RB	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	VBN	IN	PRP$	NN	.
O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Boutros-Ghali	on	Wednesday	opened	the	door	for	other	Africans	to	contest	his	job	by	saying	he	was	suspending	temporarily	his	candidacy	but	was	not	withdrawing	completely	from	the	race	.
JJ	IN	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	IN	JJ	NNPS	TO	VB	PRP$	NN	IN	VBG	PRP	VBD	VBG	RB	PRP$	NN	CC	VBD	RB	VBG	RB	IN	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
His	supporters	said	this	meant	he	remained	a	candidate	in	case	the	race	reached	an	impasse	.
PRP$	NNS	VBD	DT	VBD	PRP	VBD	DT	NN	IN	NN	DT	NN	VBD	DT	NN	.

The	United	States	on	Nov.	19	vetoed	his	bid	for	re-election	while	the	other	14	Security	Council	members	supported	him	.
DT	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	CD	VBD	PRP$	NN	IN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	CD	NNP	NNP	NNS	VBD	PRP	.

The	move	by	the	African	states	means	that	the	council	could	begin	voting	on	candidates	next	week	,	a	procedure	that	could	either	result	in	a	decision	or	turn	into	a	bitter	fight	with	vetoes	against	each	nominee	.

Spanish	police	said	on	Friday	they	had	arrested	five	people	and	seized	more	than	90	petrol	bombs	during	disturbances	after	a	protest	in	the	Basque	country	against	Spain	's	constitution	.
JJ	NNS	VBD	IN	NNP	PRP	VBD	VBN	CD	NNS	CC	VBD	JJR	IN	CD	JJ	NNS	IN	NNS	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NN	IN	NNP	POS	NN	.
B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O
Hooded	protesters	threw	burning	bottles	and	other	objects	at	police	in	Pamplona	after	the	protest	organised	by	Herri	Batasuna	,	the	political	wing	of	Basque	separatist	group	ETA	.
VBN	NNS	VBD	VBG	NNS	CC	JJ	NNS	IN	NN	IN	NNP	IN	DT	NN	VBD	IN	NNP	NNP	,	DT	JJ	NN	IN	JJ	JJ	NN	NNP	.

Police	also	confiscated	eight	kg	(	18	lb	)	of	screws	,	balaclavas	and	spray	paint	cans	.

The	protest	,	which	attracted	several	thousand	supporters	,	coincided	with	the	18th	anniversary	of	Spain	's	constitution	.

More	than	100	people	were	safely	evacuated	on	Monday	from	a	ferry	that	caught	fire	soon	after	leaving	Guernsey	in	Britain	's	Channel	Islands	,	police	said	.
JJR	IN	CD	NNS	VBD	RB	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	DT	NN	WDT	VBD	NN	RB	IN	VBG	NNP	IN	NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	,	NNS	VBD	.

Police	said	the	111	passengers	and	six	crew	on	board	the	ferry	Trident	Seven	,	owned	by	France	's	Emeraud	line	,	were	rescued	by	a	variety	of	private	and	commercial	boats	after	fire	broke	out	in	the	engine	room	soon	after	it	left	port	.
NNS	VBD	DT	CD	NNS	CC	CD	NN	IN	NN	DT	NN	NNP	CD	,	VBN	IN	NNP	POS	NNP	NN	,	VBD	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	JJ	CC	JJ	NNS	IN	NN	VBD	RB	IN	DT	NN	NN	RB	IN	PRP	VBD	NN	.

The	Dayton	peace	agreement	gave	the	OSCE	a	mandate	to	organise	Bosnian	elections	.

The	Provisional	Election	Commission	is	OSCE	's	top	rule-making	body	for	the	poll	.
DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBZ	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NN	IN	DT	NN	.
O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
More	than	600,000	refugees	have	registered	to	vote	in	55	countries	around	the	world	,	representing	about	20	per	cent	of	Bosnia	's	total	electorate	.
JJR	IN	CD	NNS	VBP	VBN	TO	VB	IN	CD	NNS	IN	DT	NN	,	VBG	RB	CD	IN	NN	IN	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O
They	are	due	to	begin	voting	on	Wednesday	,	August	28	,	just	one	day	after	the	PEC	is	supposed	to	make	its	decision	.
PRP	VBP	JJ	TO	VB	NN	IN	NNP	,	NNP	CD	,	RB	CD	NN	IN	DT	NNP	VBZ	VBN	TO	VB	PRP$	NN	.

Balloting	inside	Bosnia	is	scheduled	for	September	14	,	when	citizens	are	slated	to	elect	municipal	and	cantonal	assemblies	,	separate	Moslem-Croat	and	Serb	parliaments	,	a	national	House	of	Representatives	and	a	three-man	Presidency	.

OSCE	and	independent	monitors	allege	that	Serb	authorities	have	systematically	discouraged	refugees	from	registering	to	cast	a	ballot	in	the	places	they	lived	before	the	war	.

Sea	lion	paparazzi	to	keep	tabs	on	whales	.

LONDON	1996-08-22
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
U.S.	marine	biologists	have	trained	a	pair	of	sea	lions	to	tag	and	photograph	elusive	whales	as	they	cruise	through	the	Pacific	depths	,	New	Scientist	magazine	reported	on	Thursday	.
NNP	NN	NNS	VB	VBN	DT	NN	IN	NN	NNS	TO	VB	CC	VB	JJ	NNS	IN	PRP	VBP	IN	DT	NNP	NNS	,	NNP	NNP	NN	VBD	IN	NNP	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O
James	Harvey	and	Jennifer	Hurley	of	the	Moss	Landing	Marine	Laboratories	in	California	say	their	sea	lions	,	natural	companions	of	many	species	of	whale	,	can	go	where	no	man	or	woman	has	ever	gone	before	.
NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	VBP	PRP$	NN	NNS	,	JJ	NNS	IN	JJ	NN	IN	NN	,	MD	VB	WRB	DT	NN	CC	NN	VBZ	RB	VBN	RB	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	Any	diver	knows	that	when	a	whale	gets	going	you	ca	n't	keep	up	,	"	Harvey	told	the	magazine	.	"
"	DT	NN	VBZ	IN	WRB	DT	NN	VBZ	VBG	PRP	MD	RB	VB	RP	,	"	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O
That	is	why	we	know	only	about	five	percent	of	what	whales	do	.	"
DT	VBZ	WRB	PRP	VBP	RB	IN	CD	NN	IN	WDT	NNS	VBP	.	"
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	sea	lions	--	17-year-old	Beaver	and	nine-year-old	Sake	--	have	undergone	six	years	of	training	for	their	mission	.

Beaver	once	worked	for	the	U.S.	Navy	and	Sake	is	an	amusement	park	veteran	.

B-PER	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O
Harvey	said	they	could	accurately	tag	whales	with	a	radio	transmitter	,	and	could	also	swim	all	the	way	around	one	of	the	giant	mammals	,	filming	it	with	a	video	camera	.

Australian	Prime	Minister	John	Howard	said	the	possibility	of	lower	interest	rates	was	being	jeopardised	by	Parliament	's	upper	house	where	opposition	parties	planned	to	scrutinise	the	1996/97	budget	.

"	Every	time	the	Senate	hacks	away	at	the	budget	,	they	hack	away	at	the	lower	interest	rate	environment	,	"	Howard	told	reporters	on	Thursday	night	after	attending	a	Liberal	Party	function	.
"	DT	NN	DT	NNP	NNS	RB	IN	DT	NN	,	PRP	VB	RP	IN	DT	JJR	NN	NN	NN	,	"	NNP	VBD	NNS	IN	NNP	NN	IN	VBG	DT	NNP	NNP	NN	.

Up	to	100,000	tonnes	of	copper	held	in	Shanghai	bonded	warehouses	,	confounding	the	world	market	as	to	its	source	and	ultimate	fate	,	probably	belongs	to	China	's	strategic	state	reserve	,	industry	sources	said	on	Friday	.
IN	TO	CD	NNS	IN	NN	VBN	IN	NNP	VBN	NNS	,	VBG	DT	NN	NN	IN	TO	PRP$	NN	CC	JJ	NN	,	RB	VBZ	TO	NNP	POS	JJ	NN	NN	,	NN	NNS	VBD	IN	NNP	.

Around	40,000	tonnes	of	the	copper	have	already	been	moved	to	warehouses	near	the	northern	port	of	Yingkou	,	where	some	of	the	strategic	stockpile	was	stored	,	they	said	.
IN	CD	NNS	IN	DT	NN	VBP	RB	VBN	VBN	TO	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	,	WRB	DT	IN	DT	JJ	NN	VBD	VBN	,	PRP	VBD	.

Just	who	owns	the	copper	is	a	question	that	has	kept	traders	and	industry	analysts	guessing	since	the	metal	was	channelled	into	Shanghai	by	the	China	National	Nonferrous	Metals	Import	and	Export	Corp	(	CNIEC	)	in	June	and	July	.

But	these	concerns	were	irrelevant	,	a	Singapore	trader	said	,	despite	a	forecast	that	domestic	Chinese	copper	demand	could	hit	one	million	tonnes	this	year	.
CC	DT	NNS	VBD	JJ	,	DT	NNP	NN	VBD	,	IN	DT	NN	IN	JJ	JJ	NN	NN	MD	VB	CD	CD	NNS	DT	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
As	with	many	commodities	,	"	there	is	a	desire	(	by	the	Chinese	government	)	to	keep	a	stockpile	of	the	metal	,	"	he	said	.	"
IN	IN	JJ	NNS	,	"	EX	VBZ	DT	NN	(	IN	DT	JJ	NN	)	TO	VB	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	,	"	PRP	VBD	.	"

You	do	n't	keep	it	to	help	industry	,	you	keep	it	in	case	of	emergency	.	"

Hamburg	side	St	Pauli	,	tipped	as	prime	candidates	for	relegation	,	produced	a	stunning	second-half	fightback	to	draw	4-4	in	their	Bundesliga	clash	with	Schalke	on	Friday	.
NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	,	VBD	IN	JJ	NNS	IN	NN	,	VBD	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	TO	VB	JJ	IN	PRP$	NNP	NN	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	.

Schalke	,	who	finished	third	last	season	,	raced	to	a	3-1	lead	at	halftime	.
NNP	,	WP	VBD	JJ	JJ	NN	,	VBD	TO	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NN	.
B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
St	Pauli	pulled	a	goal	back	through	Andre	Trulsen	but	Schalke	striker	Martin	Max	restored	his	team	's	two-goal	cushion	shortly	afterwards	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP$	NN	POS	JJ	NN	RB	RB	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-ORG	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Christian	Springer	put	St	Pauli	back	in	touch	in	the	64th	minute	and	three	minutes	later	they	were	level	,	thanks	to	a	penalty	from	Thomas	Sabotzik	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	NNP	NNP	RB	IN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	CC	CD	NNS	RB	PRP	VBD	NN	,	NNS	TO	DT	NN	IN	NNP	NNP	.

Morocco	's	Salah	Hissou	broke	the	men	's	10,000	metres	world	record	on	Friday	when	he	clocked	26	minutes	38.08	seconds	at	the	Brussels	grand	prix	on	Friday	.

Russia	's	double	Olympic	champion	Svetlana	Masterkova	smashed	her	second	world	record	in	just	10	days	on	Friday	when	she	bettered	the	mark	for	the	women	's	1,000	metres	.
NNP	POS	JJ	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP$	JJ	NN	NN	IN	RB	CD	NNS	IN	NNP	WRB	PRP	VBD	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNS	POS	CD	NNS	.

After	breaking	the	world	record	for	the	women	's	mile	in	Zurich	last	Wednesday	,	the	Olympic	800	and	1,500	metres	champion	clocked	two	minutes	28.98	seconds	over	1,000	at	the	Brussels	grand	prix	meeting	.

American	Dennis	Mitchell	upstaged	a	trio	of	past	and	present	Olympic	100	metres	champions	on	Friday	with	a	storming	victory	at	the	Brussels	grand	prix	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	NN	IN	JJ	CC	JJ	NNP	CD	NNS	NNS	IN	NNP	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NNP	JJ	NN	.
B-MISC	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O
Sporting	his	customary	bright	green	outfit	,	the	U.S.	champion	clocked	10.03	seconds	despite	damp	conditions	to	take	the	scalp	of	Canada	's	reigning	Olympic	champion	Donovan	Bailey	,	1992	champion	Linford	Christie	of	Britain	and	American	1984	and	1988	champion	Carl	Lewis	.
NNP	PRP$	JJ	JJ	JJ	NN	,	DT	NNP	NN	VBN	CD	NNS	IN	NN	NNS	TO	VB	DT	NN	IN	NNP	POS	VBG	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	,	CD	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	CC	NNP	CD	CC	CD	NN	NNP	NNP	.

Britain	's	Chris	Boardman	fulfilled	his	prediction	that	he	would	break	the	world	4,000	metres	world	record	in	the	world	track	cycling	championships	on	Wednesday	.
NNP	POS	NNP	NNP	VBD	PRP$	NN	IN	PRP	MD	VB	DT	NN	CD	NNS	NN	NN	IN	DT	NN	NN	NN	NNS	IN	NNP	.
B-LOC	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Boardman	clocked	four	minutes	13.353	seconds	to	slice	more	than	six	seconds	from	the	previous	world	mark	of	4:19.699	set	by	Olympic	champion	Andrea	Collinelli	of	Italy	in	Atlanta	in	July	.
NNP	VBN	CD	NNS	CD	NNS	TO	VB	JJR	IN	CD	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	NN	IN	CD	NN	IN	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	.

Collinelli	qualified	in	second	place	,	also	beating	his	old	record	in	4:17.696	.
NNP	VBN	IN	JJ	NN	,	RB	VBG	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	CD	.

Florida	boy	kills	himself	before	starting	new	school	.
NNP	NN	VBZ	PRP	RB	VBG	JJ	NN	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
FORT	LAUDERDALE	,	Fla.	1996-08-26
NNP	NNP	,	NNP	CD
B-LOC	I-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
A	12-year-old	Florida	boy	hanged	himself	in	his	backyard	just	hours	before	he	was	due	to	start	at	a	new	school	on	Monday	,	police	said	.
DT	JJ	NNP	NN	VBN	PRP	IN	PRP$	NN	RB	NNS	IN	PRP	VBD	JJ	TO	VB	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	,	NNS	VBD	.
O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Samuel	Graham	,	who	told	his	family	earlier	that	he	was	nervous	about	starting	at	a	new	school	because	he	feared	teasing	about	his	weight	problem	,	had	been	due	to	spend	his	first	day	at	Parkway	Middle	School	Monday	,	police	said	.

Comments	by	Japan	's	tight-lipped	central	bank	chief	and	an	influential	top	bureaucrat	are	further	signs	that	the	nation	's	authorities	want	to	keep	the	dollar	at	current	levels	,	market	sources	said	on	Friday	.

In	a	rare	expression	of	a	view	on	currencies	by	the	Bank	of	Japan	(	BOJ	)	governor	,	Yasuo	Matsushita	was	quoted	in	Japan	's	leading	economic	daily	on	Friday	as	saying	that	he	sees	no	further	,	immediate	fall	in	the	yen	.

IN	CD

A	Lebanese	military	court	on	Friday	sentenced	to	death	in	absentia	the	commander	of	Israel	's	surrogate	militia	in	south	Lebanon	on	treason	charges	.
DT	JJ	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	VBD	TO	NN	IN	NN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	POS	NN	NN	IN	JJ	NNP	IN	NN	NNS	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O
The	court	convicted	General	Antoine	Lahd	,	head	of	the	South	Lebanon	Army	(	SLA	)	,	of	collaborating	with	Israel	with	which	Lebanon	is	officially	at	war	.
DT	NN	VBN	NNP	NNP	NNP	,	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	,	IN	VBG	IN	NNP	IN	WDT	NNP	VBZ	RB	IN	NN	.
O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O
Lahd	,	a	69-year-old	former	Lebanese	army	major-general	,	heads	the	3,000-strong	SLA	militia	which	helps	Israel	hold	a	border	zone	in	south	Lebanon	to	ward	off	cross-frontier	guerrilla	raids	on	northern	Israel	.
NNP	,	DT	JJ	JJ	JJ	NN	JJ	,	NNS	DT	JJ	NNP	NN	WDT	VBZ	NNP	VBP	DT	NN	NN	IN	JJ	NNP	TO	VB	RP	VB	JJ	NNS	IN	JJ	NNP	.

Lahd	said	a	few	days	after	the	trial	began	on	February	16	that	Lebanese	authorities	must	drop	the	charges	or	risk	blocking	any	peace	deal	with	the	Jewish	state	.

O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	charges	against	Lahd	were	:	forming	a	hostile	army	,	carrying	weapons	on	Israel	's	side	,	helping	Israel	strip	off	a	part	of	Lebanese	territory	by	violence	,	forming	an	armed	gang	,	killing	or	trying	to	kill	Lebanese	civilians	by	artillery	shelling	and	kidnapping	Lebanese	citizens	for	long	periods	.

Peres	,	who	was	ousted	in	May	by	rightwing	Israeli	leader	Benjamin	Netanyahu	,	said	there	could	not	be	real	negotiations	with	Lebanon	"	unless	it	will	stop	the	maltreatment	of	the	SLA	and	its	commanders	.	"

AL-AIN	,	United	Arab	Emirates	1996-12-06
NNP	,	NNP	NNP	NNPS	CD
B-LOC	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O
Japan	began	the	defence	of	their	Asian	Cup	title	with	a	lucky	2-1	win	against	Syria	in	a	Group	C	championship	match	on	Friday	.
NNP	VBD	DT	NN	IN	PRP$	JJ	NNP	NN	IN	DT	JJ	CD	VBP	IN	NNP	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NN	NN	IN	NNP	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
But	China	saw	their	luck	desert	them	in	the	second	match	of	the	group	,	crashing	to	a	surprise	2-0	defeat	to	newcomers	Uzbekistan	.
CC	NNP	VBD	PRP$	NN	VB	PRP	IN	DT	NN	NN	IN	DT	NN	,	VBG	TO	DT	NN	CD	NN	TO	NNS	NNP	.
O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O
China	controlled	most	of	the	match	and	saw	several	chances	missed	until	the	78th	minute	when	Uzbek	striker	Igor	Shkvyrin	took	advantage	of	a	misdirected	defensive	header	to	lob	the	ball	over	the	advancing	Chinese	keeper	and	into	an	empty	net	.
NNP	VBD	JJS	IN	DT	NN	CC	VBD	JJ	NNS	VBD	IN	DT	JJ	NN	WRB	NNP	NN	JJ	NNP	VBD	NN	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	TO	VB	DT	NN	IN	DT	VBG	JJ	NN	CC	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Oleg	Shatskiku	made	sure	of	the	win	in	injury	time	,	hitting	an	unstoppable	left	foot	shot	from	just	outside	the	area	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	JJ	IN	DT	VBP	IN	NN	NN	,	VBG	DT	JJ	VBD	NN	NN	IN	RB	IN	DT	NN	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	former	Soviet	republic	was	playing	in	an	Asian	Cup	finals	tie	for	the	first	time	.
DT	JJ	JJ	NN	VBD	VBG	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNS	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
Despite	winning	the	Asian	Games	title	two	years	ago	,	Uzbekistan	are	in	the	finals	as	outsiders	.

Thai	airport	police	arrested	a	British	bartender	for	allegedly	attempting	to	board	a	flight	for	Amsterdam	with	nearly	4.4	kg	(	9.68	lb	)	of	heroin	in	his	luggage	,	police	said	on	Wednesday	.

Promising	10th-ranked	American	Chanda	Rubin	has	pulled	out	of	the	U.S.	Open	Tennis	Championships	with	a	wrist	injury	,	tournament	officials	announced	.
VBG	JJ	NNP	NNP	NNP	VBZ	VBN	IN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	DT	NN	NN	,	NN	NNS	VBD	.

The	20-year-old	Rubin	,	who	was	to	be	seeded	11th	,	is	still	suffering	from	tendinitis	of	the	right	wrist	that	has	kept	her	sidelined	in	recent	months	.

B-LOC	O
The	defending	world	champion	Atlanta	Braves	,	with	the	best	record	and	best	pitching	in	baseball	,	added	another	weapon	Wednesday	,	acquiring	Denny	Neagle	,	the	winningest	left-hander	in	the	National	League	,	from	the	Pittsburgh	Pirates	.

Olympic	champions	Michael	Johnson	and	Donovan	Bailey	and	former	champion	Linford	Christie	will	run	in	a	"	Dream	Team	"	sprint	relay	squad	in	honour	of	Jesse	Owens	on	Friday	.

But	nothing	has	been	decided	as	they	are	still	waiting	for	an	X-ray	machine	to	determine	the	problem	.	"

Lenzing	expects	negative	results	in	H2	.
VBG	VBZ	JJ	NNS	IN	NN	.
B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O
VIENNA	1996-08-29
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Austrian	viscose	fibre	maker	Lenzing	AG	said	on	Thursday	it	expected	to	post	negative	group	results	in	the	second	half	of	the	year	after	posting	losses	in	the	first	six	months	.
JJ	NN	JJ	NN	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NNP	PRP	VBD	TO	VB	JJ	NN	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	VBG	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	CD	NNS	.
B-MISC	O	O	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	A	preview	of	the	second	half	of	1996	does	not	reveal	any	signs	of	a	significant	improvement	in	market	conditions	,	"	Lenzing	said	in	a	statement	released	ahead	of	its	earnings	conference	.
"	DT	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	CD	VBZ	RB	VB	DT	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NN	NNS	,	"	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	VBN	RB	IN	PRP$	NNS	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
For	the	first	six	months	of	the	year	,	Lenzing	said	it	posted	a	group	pre-tax	loss	of	84.5	million	schillings	from	a	profit	of	160	million	in	the	year-ago	period	.
IN	DT	JJ	CD	NNS	IN	DT	NN	,	NNP	VBD	PRP	VBD	DT	NN	JJ	NN	IN	CD	CD	NNS	IN	DT	NN	IN	CD	CD	IN	DT	JJ	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	group	attributed	the	first-half	losses	to	weak	demand	and	falling	prices	of	viscose	fibres	,	as	well	as	sluggish	economies	in	the	West	.
DT	NN	VBD	DT	JJ	NNS	TO	JJ	NN	CC	VBG	NNS	IN	JJ	NNS	,	RB	RB	IN	JJ	NNS	IN	DT	NNP	.

Algeria	faults	Britain	over	Islamists	gathering	.
NNP	NNS	NNP	IN	NNPS	NN	.
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	B-MISC	O	O
PARIS	1996-08-28
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Algeria	,	fighting	a	vicious	war	against	Moslem	fundamentalist	guerrillas	,	attacked	Britain	on	Wednesday	for	allowing	Islamist	groups	to	meet	in	London	.
NNP	,	VBG	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NNP	JJ	NNS	,	VBD	NNP	IN	NNP	IN	VBG	JJ	NNS	TO	VB	IN	NNP	.
B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O
The	Islamist	gathering	,	due	to	be	held	in	London	on	September	8	,	has	triggered	concern	and	anger	in	several	other	Arab	countries	like	Egypt	which	is	also	fighting	armed	Moslem	fundamentalists	.
DT	NNP	NN	,	JJ	TO	VB	VBN	IN	NNP	IN	NNP	CD	,	VBZ	VBN	NN	CC	NN	IN	JJ	JJ	JJ	NNS	IN	NNP	WDT	VBZ	RB	VBG	JJ	NNP	NNS	.
O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O
British	Jewish	groups	have	also	voiced	protest	because	they	said	Palestinian	Islamist	Hamas	as	well	as	the	banned	Algerian	Islamic	Salvation	Front	(	FIS	)	are	among	those	radical	Islamists	attending	the	conference	.
NNP	NNP	NNS	VBP	RB	VBD	NN	IN	PRP	VBD	JJ	NNP	NNP	RB	RB	IN	DT	VBN	NNP	NNP	NNP	NNP	(	NNP	)	VBP	IN	DT	JJ	NNS	VBG	DT	NN	.
B-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O

RALLYING	-	MAKINEN	STEPS	UP	TITLE	BID	WITH	LAKES	WIN	.
VBG	:	NNP	NNP	RP	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	.
O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	O	O
JYVASKYLA	,	Finland	1996-08-26
NNP	,	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
Tommi	Makinen	took	a	significant	step	towards	becoming	world	rally	champion	with	a	brilliant	victory	in	the	1000	Lakes	Rally	on	Monday	.
NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	IN	VBG	NN	NN	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	CD	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	.
B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-MISC	I-MISC	I-MISC	O	O	O
Mitsubishi	driver	Makinen	stopped	experienced	fellow	Finn	Juha	Kankkunen	in	his	tracks	on	the	final	day	of	the	1,452-km	rally	,	doubling	his	lead	on	the	first	two	decisive	stages	.
NNP	NN	NNP	VBD	VBN	NN	NNP	NNP	NNP	IN	PRP$	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	JJ	NN	,	VBG	PRP$	NN	IN	DT	JJ	CD	JJ	NNS	.
B-ORG	O	B-PER	O	O	O	B-MISC	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	This	was	the	most	difficult	win	-	three	days	at	125	percent	effort	,	"	said	Makinen	,	whose	success	completed	his	1,000	Lakes	hat-trick	.

SOCCER	-	SHARPE	HITS	WINNER	TO	EASE	PRESSURE	ON	LEEDS	.
NN	:	NNP	VBZ	NNP	TO	NN	VBP	IN	NNS	.
O	O	B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O
LEEDS	,	England	1996-08-26
NNP	,	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
Winger	Lee	Sharpe	hit	a	superb	strike	from	the	edge	of	the	penalty	area	to	give	Leeds	their	first	win	of	the	season	on	Monday	and	leave	hapless	Wimbledon	anchored	at	the	bottom	of	the	England	premier	league	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NN	NN	TO	VB	NNPS	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	CC	VB	JJ	NNP	VBD	IN	DT	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NN	NN	.
O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-LOC	O	O	O
Sharpe	repaid	a	huge	slice	of	the	4.5	million	pound	(	$	6.98	million	)	fee	Leeds	handed	Manchester	United	for	his	services	with	a	top-draw	second-half	goal	to	hand	Wimbledon	their	third	successive	defeat	.
NNP	VBD	DT	JJ	NN	IN	DT	CD	CD	NN	(	$	CD	CD	)	NN	NNP	VBD	NNP	NNP	IN	PRP$	NNS	IN	DT	JJ	JJ	NN	TO	NN	NNP	PRP$	JJ	JJ	NN	.
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-ORG	O	O	O	O	O
Ian	Rush	,	the	Welsh	striker	signed	from	Liverpool	in	the	close	season	,	set	up	the	goal	,	feeding	Sharpe	as	he	galloped	forward	and	the	former	England	winger	cut	inside	onto	his	unfavoured	right	foot	to	arc	a	shot	into	the	right-hand	corner	of	the	net	.

SQUASH	-	EYLES	WITHIN	SIGHT	OF	FIFTH	TITLE	OF	YEAR	.
NNP	:	NNP	NNP	VBP	IN	IN	DT	IN	NNP	.
O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
BOMBAY	,	India	1996-12-06
NNP	,	NNP	CD
B-LOC	O	B-LOC	O
World	number	two	Rodney	Eyles	moved	within	sight	of	his	fifth	title	of	the	year	on	Friday	when	he	hurried	in	only	40	minutes	to	the	final	of	the	richest	squash	tournament	outside	the	World	Open	,	the	$	105,000	Mahindra	International	.
NNP	NN	CD	NNP	NNP	VBD	IN	NN	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	IN	NNP	WRB	PRP	VBD	IN	RB	CD	NNS	TO	DT	JJ	IN	DT	JJS	NN	NN	IN	DT	NNP	NNP	,	DT	$	CD	NNP	NNP	.

The	Australian	brushed	aside	unseeded	Englishman	Mark	Cairns	15-7	15-6	15-8	.
DT	NNP	VBD	RB	VBN	NNP	NNP	NNP	CD	CD	CD	.
O	B-MISC	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	O	O	O
Top-seeded	Eyles	now	meets	titleholder	Peter	Nicol	of	Scotland	who	overcame	Simon	Parke	of	England	15-7	15-12	15-12	.
JJ	NNPS	RB	VBZ	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	WP	VBD	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	CD	CD	NN	.
O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O
Nicol	was	full	of	praise	for	his	opponent	who	has	battled	testicular	cancer	to	return	to	the	circuit	.	"
NNP	VBD	JJ	IN	NN	IN	PRP$	NN	WP	VBZ	VBN	JJ	NN	TO	VB	TO	DT	NN	.	"
B-PER	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
He	's	a	remarkably	courageous	player	,	"	said	Nicol	.

At	issue	was	a	May	20	agreement	allowing	Iraq	to	sell	$	2	billion	worth	of	oil	to	purchase	badly	needed	food	,	medicine	and	other	supplies	to	ease	the	impact	of	sanctions	in	force	since	its	troops	invaded	Kuwait	in	August	1990	.

The	Salang	tunnel	linking	Kabul	with	northern	Afghanistan	was	formally	reopened	to	traffic	on	Thursday	under	an	agreement	between	the	government	and	an	opposition	militia	,	witnesses	said	.

SEATTLE	1996-08-29
NNP	CD
B-LOC	O
Sierra	Semiconductor	Corp	jumped	23	percent	Thursday	on	the	expectation	the	company	would	emerge	as	a	smaller	but	more	profitable	operation	after	its	planned	exit	from	the	computer	modem	business	.
NNP	NNP	NNP	VBD	CD	NN	NNP	IN	DT	NN	DT	NN	MD	VB	IN	DT	JJR	CC	RBR	JJ	NN	IN	PRP$	JJ	NN	IN	DT	NN	NN	NN	.
B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
The	San	Jose	,	Calif.	,	company	was	up	2-1/8	at	11-3/8	after	its	announcement	Wednesday	that	it	planned	to	pull	out	of	the	highly	competitive	modem-chip	business	and	focus	instead	on	the	fast-growing	market	for	computer	networking	equipment	.
DT	NNP	NNP	,	NNP	,	NN	VBD	RB	JJ	IN	CD	IN	PRP$	NN	NNP	IN	PRP	VBD	TO	VB	IN	IN	DT	RB	JJ	NN	NN	CC	NN	RB	IN	DT	JJ	NN	IN	NN	NN	NN	.
O	B-LOC	I-LOC	O	B-LOC	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O
"	Certainly	the	company	will	be	a	much	smaller	company	now	,	but	it	will	be	a	more	profitable	business	,	"	said	analyst	Elias	Moosa	of	Roberston	Stephens	&	Co	.
"	RB	DT	NN	MD	VB	DT	RB	JJR	NN	RB	,	CC	PRP	MD	VB	DT	RBR	JJ	NN	,	"	VBD	NN	NNP	NNP	IN	NNP	NNP	CC	NNP	.
O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	O	B-PER	I-PER	O	B-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	I-ORG	O
But	analysts	noted	that	Sierra	still	has	much	painful	work	ahead	of	it	,	including	cutting	as	many	as	150	jobs	from	its	workforce	,	which	currently	has	500	people	,	and	building	up	the	business	of	its	PMC-Sierra	unit	,	which	makes	routing	devices	and	chipsets	for	high-speed	computer	networks	.
